response_parameters.name: tax_info
response_parameters.description: Tax information

response_parameters.name: ncm
response_parameters.description: Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves.(BR region) Note: ncm = "00" means that this item doesn't have a NCM.

response_parameters.name: diff_state_cfop
response_parameters.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice. (BR region)

response_parameters.name: csosn
response_parameters.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations. (BR region)

response_parameters.name: origin
response_parameters.description: Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region)

response_parameters.name: cest
response_parameters.description: Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region) Note: cest = "00" means that this item doesn't have a CEST.

response_parameters.name: measure_unit
response_parameters.description: (BR region)

response_parameters.name: invoice_option
response_parameters.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

response_parameters.name: vat_rate
response_parameters.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

response_parameters.name: hs_code
response_parameters.description: HS Code (Only for IN region)

response_parameters.name: tax_code
response_parameters.description: Tax Code (Only for IN region)

response_parameters.name: tax_type
response_parameters.description: tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 0: no tax type 1: tax-able 2: tax-free

response_parameters.name: pis
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights. PIS % - the tax applied to this product

response_parameters.name: cofins
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security. COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

response_parameters.name: icms_cst
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

response_parameters.name: pis_cofins_cst
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

response_parameters.name: federal_state_taxes
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

response_parameters.name: operation_type
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. 1: Retailer 2: Manufacturer

response_parameters.name: ex_tipi
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

response_parameters.name: fci_num
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

response_parameters.name: recopi_num
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

response_parameters.name: additional_info
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

response_parameters.name: group_item_info
response_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Required if the item is a group item.

response_parameters.name: group_qtd
response_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

response_parameters.name: group_unit
response_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

response_parameters.name: group_unit_value
response_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

response_parameters.name: original_group_price
response_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

response_parameters.name: group_gtin_sscc
response_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

response_parameters.name: group_grai_gtin_sscc
response_parameters.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

response_parameters.name: export_cfop
response_parameters.description: 7101 - for sales of self-produced goods 7102 - resale of third-party goods a tax code used in Brazil to classify and identify the nature of goods or services transactions for tax purposes. This is used for goods export to other counties

request_example.php:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/get_item_base_info?access_token=access_token&item_id_list=%5B34001+34002%5D&need_complaint_policy=true&need_tax_info=true&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

request_parameters.name: ncm
request_parameters.description: Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region) NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

request_parameters.name: same_state_cfop
request_parameters.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

request_parameters.name: diff_state_cfop
request_parameters.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

request_parameters.name: csosn
request_parameters.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.(BR region)

request_parameters.name: origin
request_parameters.description: Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region). |0 - National, except for those indicated in codes 3, 4, 5, and 8| |1 - Foreign: Direct import, except for that indicated in code 6| |2 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, except for that indicated in code 7| |3 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 40% and less than or equal to 70%| |4 - National: Produced in compliance with the basic production processes outlined in the legislations cited in the Agreements| |5 - National: Goods or products with Import Content less than or equal to 40%| |6 - Foreign: Direct import, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas| |7 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas| |8 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 70%|

request_parameters.name: cest
request_parameters.description: Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region) CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

request_parameters.name: icms_cst
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

request_parameters.name: pis_cofins_cst
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

request_parameters.name: federal_state_taxes
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

request_parameters.name: operation_type
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. 1: Retailer 2: Manufacturer

request_parameters.name: ex_tipi
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

request_parameters.name: fci_num
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

request_parameters.name: recopi_num
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

request_parameters.name: additional_info
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

request_parameters.name: group_item_info
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Required if the item is a group item.

request_parameters.name: group_qtd
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

request_parameters.name: group_unit
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

request_parameters.name: group_unit_value
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

request_parameters.name: original_group_price
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

request_parameters.name: group_gtin_sscc
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

request_parameters.name: group_grai_gtin_sscc
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

request_parameters.name: export_cfop
request_parameters.description: [BR region] 7101 - for sales of self-produced goods 7102 - resale of third-party goods

request_parameters.name: complaint_policy
request_parameters.description: Complaint Policy for item. Only required for local PL sellers, ignored otherwise.

request_parameters.name: warranty_time
request_parameters.description: Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

request_parameters.name: exclude_entrepreneur_warranty
request_parameters.description: Whether to exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneurs.If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

request_parameters.name: complaint_address_id
request_parameters.description: Address for complaint. Fetch available addresses using v2.logistics.get_address_list, and use address_id returned from it.

request_parameters.name: additional_information
request_parameters.description: Additional information for warranty claim. Should be less than 1000 characters.

request_parameters.name: description_info
request_parameters.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

request_parameters.name: extended_description
request_parameters.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

request_parameters.name: field_list
request_parameters.description: Field of extended description.

request_parameters.name: field_type
request_parameters.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

request_parameters.name: text
request_parameters.description: If field_type is text， text information will be set by this field.

request_parameters.name: image_info
request_parameters.description: If field_type is image，image url will be set by this field.

request_parameters.name: image_id
request_parameters.description: Image id.

request_parameters.name: description_type
request_parameters.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description, this field must be inputed

request_parameters.name: seller_stock
request_parameters.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

request_parameters.name: location_id
request_parameters.description: location id

request_parameters.name: stock
request_parameters.description: stock

request_parameters.name: gtin_code
request_parameters.description: - GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1. - They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN. - GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook. - That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing. Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00". The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API - Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number. - Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN. - Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

request_parameters.name: ds_cat_rcmd_id
request_parameters.description: category recommendation service id

request_parameters.name: promotion_images
request_parameters.description: Promotion Image Currently only allow one promoton image You could set promotion image only if the product images' ratio is 3:4

request_parameters.name: image_id_list
request_parameters.description: Promotion Image

request_parameters.name: brand_id
request_parameters.description: ID of the brand.

request_parameters.name: model_id
request_parameters.description: ID of the model.

request_parameters.name: year_id
request_parameters.description: ID of the year.

request_parameters.name: version_id
request_parameters.description: ID of the version.

request_parameters.name: scheduled_publish_time
request_parameters.description: Scheduled publish time of this item: 1) Can only set scheduled_publish_time for item with UNLIST status 2) Can only set the time from current time +1hour to current time +90days, and the time is only allowed to be accurate to the minute

request_parameters.name: authorised_brand_id
request_parameters.description: ID of authorised reseller brand.

request_parameters.name: size_chart
request_parameters.description: ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty. You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept. Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

request_parameters.name: size_chart_id
request_parameters.description: ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0. You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept. Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

request_parameters.name: expiry_date

request_parameters.name: ratio

request_example.php:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/add_item?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "attribute_list": [
        {
            "attribute_id": 4990,
            "attribute_value_list": [
                {
                    "original_value_name": "Brand",
                    "value_id": 32142,
                    "value_unit": " kg"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "brand": {
        "brand_id": 0,
        "original_brand_name": "nike"
    },
    "category_id": 14695,
    "complaint_policy": {
        "additional_information": "-",
        "complaint_address_id": 0,
        "exclude_entrepreneur_warranty": true,
        "warranty_time": "-"
    },
    "condition": "NEW",
    "description": "item description test",
    "description_info": {
        "extended_description": {
            "field_list": [
                {
                    "field_type": "-",
                    "image_info": {
                        "image_id": "-"
                    },
                    "text": "-"
                }
            ]
        }
    },
    "description_type": "-",
    "dimension": {
        "package_height": 11,
        "package_length": 11,
        "package_width": 11
    },
    "image": {
        "image_id_list": [
            "-"
        ]
    },
    "item_dangerous": 0,
    "item_name": "Item Name Example",
    "item_sku": "-",
    "item_status": "UNLIST",
    "logistic_info": [
        {
            "enabled": true,
            "is_free": true,
            "logistic_id": 80101,
            "shipping_fee": 23.12,
            "size_id": 0
        }
    ],
    "normal_stock": 33,
    "original_price": 123.3,
    "pre_order": {
        "days_to_ship": 3,
        "is_pre_order": true
    },
    "seller_stock": [
        {
            "location_id": "-",
            "stock": 0
        }
    ],
    "tax_info": {
        "cest": "-",
        "csosn": "-",
        "diff_state_cfop": "-",
        "hs_code": "-",
        "invoice_option": "-",
        "measure_unit": "-",
        "ncm": "-",
        "origin": "-",
        "same_state_cfop": "-",
        "tax_code": "-",
        "vat_rate": "-"
    },
    "video_upload_id": [
        "sg_f4bde9bc-ff3c-485e-a6dd-3161dab4b942_000000"
    ],
    "weight": 1.1,
    "wholesale": [
        {
            "max_count": 100,
            "min_count": 1,
            "unit_price": 28.3
        }
    ]
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

request_parameters.name: tax_info
request_parameters.description: Tax information

request_parameters.name: ncm
request_parameters.description: Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region) NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

request_parameters.name: same_state_cfop
request_parameters.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.

request_parameters.name: diff_state_cfop
request_parameters.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.

request_parameters.name: csosn
request_parameters.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.

request_parameters.name: origin
request_parameters.description: Product source, domestic or foreig

request_parameters.name: cest
request_parameters.description: Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region) CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

request_parameters.name: measure_unit
request_parameters.description: (BR region)

request_parameters.name: invoice_option
request_parameters.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

request_parameters.name: vat_rate
request_parameters.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

request_parameters.name: hs_code
request_parameters.description: HS Code. (Only for IN region)

request_parameters.name: tax_code
request_parameters.description: Tax Code. (Only for IN region)

request_parameters.name: tax_type
request_parameters.description: tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 0: no tax type 1: tax-able 2: tax-free

request_parameters.name: pis
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights. PIS % - the tax applied to this product

request_parameters.name: cofins
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security. COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

request_parameters.name: icms_cst
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

request_parameters.name: pis_cofins_cst
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

request_parameters.name: federal_state_taxes
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

request_parameters.name: operation_type
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. 1: Retailer 2: Manufacturer

request_parameters.name: ex_tipi
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

request_parameters.name: fci_num
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

request_parameters.name: recopi_num
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

request_parameters.name: additional_info
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

request_parameters.name: group_item_info
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Required if the item is a group item.

request_parameters.name: group_qtd
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

request_parameters.name: group_unit
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

request_parameters.name: group_unit_value
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

request_parameters.name: original_group_price
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

request_parameters.name: group_gtin_sscc
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

request_parameters.name: group_grai_gtin_sscc
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

request_parameters.name: export_cfop
request_parameters.description: 7101 - for sales of self-produced goods 7102 - resale of third-party goods

request_parameters.name: complaint_policy
request_parameters.description: Complaint Policy for item. Only required for local PL sellers, ignored otherwise.

request_parameters.name: warranty_time
request_parameters.description: Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

request_parameters.name: exclude_entrepreneur_warranty
request_parameters.description: If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

request_parameters.name: complaint_address_id
request_parameters.description: Address for complaint. Fetch available addresses using v2.logistics.get_address_list, and use address_id returned from it.

request_parameters.name: additional_information
request_parameters.description: Additional information for warranty claim. Should be less than 1000 characters.

request_parameters.name: description_info
request_parameters.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

request_parameters.name: gtin_code
request_parameters.description: - GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1. - They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN. - GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook. - That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing. Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00". The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API - Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number. - Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN. - Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

request_parameters.name: ds_cat_rcmd_id

request_parameters.name: promotion_images
request_parameters.description: Promotion Image Currently only allow one promoton image You could set promotion image only if the product images' ratio is 3:4

request_parameters.name: version_id

request_parameters.name: scheduled_publish_time
request_parameters.description: Scheduled publish time of this item: 1) Can only set scheduled_publish_time for item with UNLIST status 2) Can only set the time from current time +1hour to current time +90days, and the time is only allowed to be accurate to the minute

request_parameters.name: authorised_brand_id
request_parameters.description: ID of authorised reseller brand.

request_parameters.name: size_chart
request_parameters.description: ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty. You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept. Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

request_parameters.name: size_chart_id
request_parameters.description: ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0. You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept. Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

request_parameters.name: ratio
request_parameters.description: image weight/ image height Will be optional in the future; can input 0.75 by default

request_example.php:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/update_item?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "attribute_list": [
        {
            "attribute_id": 5357,
            "attribute_value_list": [
                {
                    "original_value_name": "Red",
                    "value_id": 38173,
                    "value_unit": "kg"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "brand": {
        "brand_id": 0,
        "original_brand_name": "nike"
    },
    "category_id": 34106,
    "complaint_policy": {
        "additional_information": "-",
        "complaint_address_id": 0,
        "exclude_entrepreneur_warranty": true,
        "warranty_time": "-"
    },
    "condition": "USED",
    "description": "Hello product product WlQPdMV4SlVoG7QD1v0fEecNoCVEBNx6",
    "description_info": {
        "extended_description": {
            "field_list": [
                {
                    "field_type": "-",
                    "image_info": {
                        "image_id": "-"
                    },
                    "text": "-"
                }
            ]
        }
    },
    "description_type": "-",
    "dimension": {
        "package_height": 13,
        "package_length": 12,
        "package_width": 14
    },
    "image": {
        "image_id_list": [
            {}
        ]
    },
    "item_dangerous": 0,
    "item_id": 2800143058,
    "item_name": "Hello Pgkk50jdNgEnlWvX",
    "item_sku": "abc",
    "item_status": "UNLIST",
    "logistic_info": [
        {
            "enabled": true,
            "is_free": true,
            "logistic_id": 10007,
            "shipping_fee": 9,
            "size_id": 1
        }
    ],
    "pre_order": {
        "days_to_ship": 7,
        "is_pre_order": true
    },
    "tax_info": {
        "cest": "-",
        "csosn": "-",
        "diff_state_cfop": "-",
        "hs_code": "-",
        "invoice_option": "-",
        "measure_unit": "-",
        "ncm": "-",
        "origin": "-",
        "same_state_cfop": "-",
        "tax_code": "-",
        "vat_rate": "-"
    },
    "video_upload_id": [
        {}
    ],
    "weight": 0.9,
    "wholesale": [
        {
            "max_count": 10,
            "min_count": 0,
            "unit_price": 9.9
        }
    ]
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

v2.product.init_tier_variation.description: Use this call to delete a product item.

request_parameters.name: item_id
request_parameters.description: ID of item

request_parameters.name: tier_variation
request_parameters.description: Tier variation info list: If you define a one tier structure, the maximum number of options cannot exceed 100. If you define a two tier structure, the number of options multiplied by the two tiers cannot exceed 100. If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

request_parameters.name: name
request_parameters.description: Tier variation name

request_parameters.name: option_list
request_parameters.description: Tier variation option info list

request_parameters.name: option
request_parameters.description: Option name

request_parameters.name: image
request_parameters.description: Option image

request_parameters.name: image_id
request_parameters.description: ID of image. You can choose to define or not define the option image. If you choose to define, you can only define an image for the first tier, and you need to define an image for all options of the first tier

request_parameters.name: model
request_parameters.description: Model info list, model number at most 50

request_parameters.name: tier_index
request_parameters.description: Tier index of this model. If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

request_parameters.name: original_price
request_parameters.description: Original price of this model. For CO local VAT responsible seller：Please remember the price you set in here must be VAT inclusive. If you have any doubts on how to calculate VAT for your product please refer to the Seller Education Hub（https://seller.shopee.com.co/edu/article/13565）

request_parameters.name: model_sku
request_parameters.description: Seller SKU of this model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

request_parameters.name: seller_stock
request_parameters.description: new stock info（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

request_parameters.name: location_id
request_parameters.description: location id, you can get the location id from v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail api, if seller don't have any warehouse, you don't need to upload this field.

request_parameters.description: stock

Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00". The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API - Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number. - Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN. - Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/init_tier_variation?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "model": [
        {
            "gtin_code": "-",
            "model_sku": "SKU",
            "original_price": 38.3,
            "seller_stock": [
                {
                    "location_id": "-",
                    "stock": 0
                }
            ],
            "weight": 1.1
        }
    ],
    "standardise_tier_variation": [
        {
            "variation_group_id": 2,
            "variation_id": 1,
            "variation_name": "name1",
            "variation_option_list": [
                {
                    "image_id": "82becb4830bd2ee90ad6acf8a9dc26d7",
                    "variation_option_id": 0,
                    "variation_option_name": "option2"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "tier_variation": [
        {
            "name": "Color",
            "option_list": [
                {
                    "image": {
                        "image_id": "82becb4830bd2ee90ad6acf8a9dc26d7"
                    },
                    "option": "Red"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}',

    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

v2.product.update_tier_variation.description: You can change the tier structure through this API. If you only define color, it is one tier, if you define color and size, it is two tier. Support two tier structures at most. This API can change no tier to one tier, no tier to two tier, one tier to two tier, two tier to one tier, one tier to no tier, two tier to no tier. More detail please check : https://open.shopee.com/developer-guide/219. Please create variants after an interval of 5 seconds after creating an item, as there may be a delay.

request_parameters.name: gtin_code
request_parameters.description: - GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1. - They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN. - GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook. - That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing. Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00". The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API - Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number. - Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN. - Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API - Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number. - Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN. - Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

request_example.python:
import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/boost_item?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "item_id_list": [
    2300069665,
    2400143710,
    2700128119,
    3200139749,
    3400138725
  ]
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.request("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)

v2.product.add_ssp_item.description: Get the SSP details with all available info, searching through ssp_id, gtin or oem.

request_parameters.name: ssp_id
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for Shopee Standard Product.

request_parameters.name: original_price
request_parameters.description: The price of this item.

request_parameters.name: item_status
request_parameters.description: Item status, could be UNLIST or NORMAL.

request_parameters.name: dimension
request_parameters.description: The dimension of this item.

request_parameters.name: package_length
request_parameters.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

request_parameters.name: package_width
request_parameters.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

request_parameters.name: package_height
request_parameters.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

request_parameters.name: logistic_info
request_parameters.description: Logistic channel setting of this item.

request_parameters.name: logistic_id
request_parameters.description: ID of the channel.

request_parameters.name: enabled
request_parameters.description: Whether channel is enabled for this item.

request_parameters.name: shipping_fee
request_parameters.description: Shipping fee, only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

request_parameters.name: size_id
request_parameters.description: Size ID, only needed when logistic fee_type = SIZE_SELECTION.

request_parameters.name: is_free
request_parameters.description: Whether cover shipping fee for buyer.

request_parameters.name: attribute_id
request_parameters.description: ID of attribute.

request_parameters.name: value_id
request_parameters.description: Value ID. In the following cases, the value id needs to be uploaded as 0, and original_value_name is mandatory, needs to be filled in customized value. (1) AttributeInputType is TEXT_FILED; (2) AttributeInputType is COMBO_BOX or MULTIPLE_SELECT_COMBO_BOX, and the seller want to fill in a customized value.

request_parameters.name: original_value_name
request_parameters.description: Value name. original_value_name from product.get_attributes api. If value id=0, this field is required. If AttributeType is DATE_TYPE or TIMESTAMP_TYPE, you can upload timestamp(string type) as the original_value_name.

request_parameters.name: value_unit
request_parameters.description: Unit of attribute value (quantitative attribute only).

request_parameters.name: pre_order
request_parameters.description: Pre order setting of this item.

request_parameters.name: is_pre_order
request_parameters.description: Whether this item is pre order.

request_parameters.name: days_to_ship
request_parameters.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders. Please get the days_to_ship range from get_item_limit api.

request_parameters.name: item_sku
request_parameters.description: SKU tag of this item.

request_parameters.name: condition
request_parameters.description: Condition of item, could be USED or NEW.

request_parameters.name: wholesale
request_parameters.description: Wholesale setting of this item.

request_parameters.name: min_count
request_parameters.description: Minimum count of this tier.

request_parameters.name: max_count
request_parameters.description: Maximum count of this tier.

request_parameters.name: unit_price
request_parameters.description: Unit price of this tier.

request_parameters.name: video_upload_id
request_parameters.description: Video upload ID returned from video uploading API. Only accept one video_upload_id.

request_parameters.name: item_dangerous
request_parameters.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

request_parameters.name: tax_info
request_parameters.description: Tax information for this item.

request_parameters.name: ncm
request_parameters.description: Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region) NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

request_parameters.name: same_state_cfop
request_parameters.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

request_parameters.name: diff_state_cfop
request_parameters.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

request_parameters.name: csosn
request_parameters.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.(BR region)

request_parameters.name: origin
request_parameters.description: Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region).

request_parameters.name: cest
request_parameters.description: Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region) CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

request_parameters.name: measure_unit
request_parameters.description: (BR region)

request_parameters.name: invoice_option
request_parameters.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

request_parameters.name: vat_rate
request_parameters.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

request_parameters.name: hs_code
request_parameters.description: HS Code (Only for IN region)

request_parameters.name: tax_code
request_parameters.description: Tax Code (Only for IN region)

request_parameters.name: tax_type
request_parameters.description: tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 0: no tax type 1: tax-able 2: tax-free

request_parameters.name: pis
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights. PIS % - the tax applied to this product

request_parameters.name: cofins
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security. COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

request_parameters.name: icms_cst
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

request_parameters.name: pis_cofins_cst
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

request_parameters.name: federal_state_taxes
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

request_parameters.name: operation_type
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. 1: Retailer 2: Manufacturer

request_parameters.name: ex_tipi
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

request_parameters.name: fci_num
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

request_parameters.name: recopi_num
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

request_parameters.name: additional_info
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

request_parameters.name: group_item_info
request_parameters.description: Only for BR shop. Required if the item is a group item.

request_parameters.name: group_qtd
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

request_parameters.name: group_unit
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

request_parameters.name: group_unit_value
request_parameters.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

request_parameters.name: original_group_price
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

request_parameters.name: group_gtin_sscc
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

request_parameters.name: group_grai_gtin_sscc
request_parameters.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

request_parameters.name: seller_stock
request_parameters.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

request_parameters.name: location_id
request_parameters.description: location id

request_parameters.name: stock
request_parameters.description: stock

request_parameters.name: size_chart
request_parameters.description: ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty. Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

request_parameters.name: size_chart_id
request_parameters.description: ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0. Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

request_parameters.name: authorised_brand_id
request_parameters.description: ID of authorised reseller brand.

request_parameters.name: model_list
request_parameters.description: Model info list.

request_parameters.description: Tier index of this model.

request_parameters.name: model_sku
request_parameters.description: Seller SKU of this model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

request_parameters.description: Original price of this model.

request_parameters.name: stock
request_parameters.description: stock

request_parameters.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

request_parameters.name: package_width
request_parameters.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

request_parameters.name: package_height
request_parameters.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

request_parameters.name: pre_order
request_parameters.description: Pre-order information of this model. Notes: If don't set the DTS of this model, will use the DTS of the item by default.

request_parameters.description: Whether the model is pre order.

request_parameters.name: days_to_ship
request_parameters.description: Days to ship. Please get the days_to_ship range from the get_item_limit API.

v2.global_product.init_tier_variation.description: Delete global item. Only for China mainland sellers and Korean sellers.

request_parameters.name: tier_variation
request_parameters.description: Tier variation info list. If you define a one tier structure, the maximum number of options cannot exceed 50. If you define a two tier structure, the number of options multiplied by the two tiers cannot exceed 50. If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the global_model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

request_parameters.name: name
request_parameters.description: Tier variation name.

request_parameters.name: option_list
request_parameters.description: Tier variation option info list.

request_parameters.name: option
request_parameters.description: Option name.

request_parameters.name: image
request_parameters.description: Tier image.

request_parameters.name: image_id
request_parameters.description: Tier image id.

request_parameters.name: global_model
request_parameters.description: Model info list, model number at most 50

request_parameters.name: original_price
request_parameters.description: Original price of global model.

request_parameters.name: seller_stock
request_parameters.description: seller_stock of global item

request_parameters.name: location_id
request_parameters.description: location_id of stock, if the merchant has 3PF shop, the location_id cannot be empty, can use the get_merchant_warehouse_location_list API to obtain the location_id list of the merchant, if the merchant does not have 3PF shop (only has normal CBSC shop), the location_id can be empty

request_parameters.name: stock
request_parameters.description: stock

request_parameters.name: global_model_sku
request_parameters.description: Sku of global model. model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

request_parameters.name: tier_index
request_parameters.description: Tier index of global model. Index starts from 0. If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the global_model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

request_parameters.name: weight
request_parameters.description: The weight of this global model, the unit is KG. If don't set the weight of this global model, will use the weight of global item by default. If set the dimension of this global model, them must set the weight of this global model.

request_parameters.description: The dimension of this global model. If don't set the dimension of this global model, will use the dimension of global item by default.

}',

v2.global_product.update_tier_variation.description: Only for China mainland sellers and Korean sellers. If you only define color, it is one tier, if you define color and size, it is two tier. Support two tier structures at most. This API can change no tier to one tier, no tier to two tier, one tier to two tier, two tier to one tier, one tier to no tier, two tier to no tier. response_parameters.description: Use this filed to indicate whether the shop is a cross-border shop.

response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: auth_time
response_parameters.description: The timestamp when the shop was authorized to the partner.

response_parameters.name: expire_time
response_parameters.description: Use this field to indicate the expiration date for shop authorization.

response_parameters.name: is_sip
response_parameters.description: This filed will return "true" when SIP primary shop or affiliate shop calls

response_parameters.name: is_upgraded_cbsc
response_parameters.description: Use this filed to indicate whether this merchant is upgraded to CBSC, including CNSC and KRSC.

response_parameters.name: merchant_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee’s unique identifier for a merchant. If the shop won't under any merchant, then the value will be null.

response_parameters.name: shop_fulfillment_flag
response_parameters.description: Use this field to indicate the fulfillment type of current shop, the applicable values: - Pure - FBS Shop: Single mode, refer to Local/CB shops which only have Shopee official warehouse stock, orders are fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse; - Pure - 3PF Shop: Single mode, refer to CB shops which only have local seller warehouse stock, orders are fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels; - PFF - FBS Shop: 1) Hybird mode, refer to Local shops which have both Shopee official warehouse stock and local seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse and can also fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels; 2) Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have both Shopee official warehouse stock and CB seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse and can also fulfilled by seller from CB seller warehouse via CB logistics channels; - PFF - 3PF Shop: Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have both local seller warehouse stock and CB seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels and can also fulfilled by seller from CB seller warehouse via CB logistics channels; - LFF Hybrid Shop: Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have 3 types of stock: FBS stock (Shopee official warehouse stock), 3PF stock (CB seller own stock in the local market) and CB SLS stock (CB seller own stock in CN/HK/KR); - Others - Unknown: Returned when obtaining shop_fulfillment_flag information fails

response_parameters.name: is_main_shop
response_parameters.description: Identifies if the current shop is a Local Shop linked to Cross Border Direct Shop.

response_parameters.name: is_direct_shop
response_parameters.description: Identifies if the current shop is a Cross Border Direct Shop.

response_parameters.name: linked_main_shop_id
response_parameters.description: Returns the Shop ID of the Local Shop linked to the Cross Border Direct Shop.

response_parameters.name: linked_direct_shop_list
response_parameters.description: Returns the list of Cross Border Direct Shops linked to the Local Shop.

response_parameters.name: direct_shop_id
response_parameters.description: Shop ID of the Cross Border Direct Shop.

response_parameters.name: direct_shop_region
response_parameters.description: Shop Region of the Cross Border Direct Shop.

response_parameters.name: is_one_awb
response_parameters.description: Use this filed to indicate if the shop is in 1-AWB whitelist. If is_one_awb return true, please use new AWB size (10cm x 15cm thermal paper) to print AWB. For more details, please refer to: https://open.shopee.com/announcements/1138?category=3&is_top=false

v2.shop.get_authorised_reseller_brand.description: get Seller Center notification, the permission is controlled by App type

request_parameters.name: page_no
request_parameters.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 30.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: is_authorised_reseller
response_parameters.description: This is to indicate whether the shop is authorised reseller.

response_parameters.name: total_count
response_parameters.description: The number of authorised brand linked with the shop.

response_parameters.name: more
response_parameters.description: This is to indicate whether the authorised brand list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of authorised brand.

response_parameters.name: brand_id
response_parameters.description: ID of the authorised brand, it may be the same in different regions.

response_parameters.name: brand_name
response_parameters.description: Name of the authorised brand.

request_parameters.description: // how to use DoubleSidedCursor // Get data for the first page: Please pass next_id = 0 or nil, page_size = {your page size}. // Get data for the next page: Please pass the Cursor from the previous response, and set prev_id=nil; // Get data for the prev page: Please pass the Cursor from the previous response, and set next_id=nil; // Stop fetching next data: The Cursor.next_id in the previous response is nil. // Stop fetching prev data: The Cursor.prev_id in the previous response is nil.

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: The size of one page. Limit is [1,30].

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: shop_list
response_parameters.description: Eligible shop list of the warehouse

response_parameters.name: shop_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop.

response_parameters.name: shop_name
response_parameters.description: Name of the shop.

v2.order.get_order_list.description: Get eligible shop list by warehouse id

request_parameters.name: time_range_field
request_parameters.description: The kind of time_from and time_to. Available value: create_time, update_time.

request_parameters.name: time_from
request_parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: time_to
request_parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

request_parameters.name: cursor
request_parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. The default is empty. If the data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start the next call.

request_parameters.name: order_status
request_parameters.description: The order_status filter for retriveing orders and each one only every request. Available value: UNPAID/READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/COMPLETED/IN_CANCEL/CANCELLED/INVOICE_PENDING

request_parameters.name: response_optional_fields
request_parameters.description: Optional fields in response. Available value: order_status.

request_parameters.name: request_order_status_pending
request_parameters.description: Compatible parameter during migration period, send True will let API support PENDING status, send False or don’t send will fallback to old logic.

request_parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of logistic channel. Valid only for BR.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: more
response_parameters.description: This is to indicate whether the order list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve orders.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: order_status
response_parameters.description: The order_status filter for retriveing orders and each one only every request. Available value: UNPAID/READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/COMPLETED/IN_CANCEL/CANCELLED

response_parameters.name: booking_sn
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for a booking. Only returned for advance fulfilment matched order only.

response_parameters.name: next_cursor
response_parameters.description: If more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.
