v2.order.get_order_detail.description: Use this api to search orders. You may also filter them by status, if needed.

request_parameters.name: order_sn_list
request_parameters.description: The set of order_sn. If there are multiple order_sn, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]

request_parameters.name: request_order_status_pending
request_parameters.description: Compatible parameter during migration period, send True will let API support PENDING status and return pending_terms, send False or don’t send will fallback to old logic

request_parameters.name: response_optional_fields
request_parameters.description: a response fields you want to get. Please select from the below response parameters. If you input an object field, all the params under it will be included automatically in the response. If there are multiple response fields you want to get, you need to use English comma to connect them. Available values: buyer_user_id,buyer_username,estimated_shipping_fee,recipient_address,actual_shipping_fee ,goods_to_declare,note,note_update_time,item_list,pay_time,dropshipper, dropshipper_phone,split_up,buyer_cancel_reason,cancel_by,cancel_reason,actual_shipping_fee_confirmed,buyer_cpf_id,fulfillment_flag,pickup_done_time,package_list,shipping_carrier,payment_method,total_amount,buyer_username,invoice_data,order_chargeable_weight_gram,return_request_due_date,edt

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: order_list
response_parameters.description: The list of orders.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: region
response_parameters.description: Return by default. The two-digit code representing the region where the order was made.

response_parameters.name: currency
response_parameters.description: Return by default. The three-digit code representing the currency unit for which the order was paid.

response_parameters.name: cod
response_parameters.description: Return by default. This value indicates whether the order was a COD (cash on delivery) order.

response_parameters.name: total_amount
response_parameters.description: The total amount paid by the buyer for the order. This amount includes the total sale price of items, shipping cost beared by buyer; and offset by Shopee promotions if applicable. This value will only return after the buyer has completed payment for the order.

response_parameters.name: pending_terms
response_parameters.description: The list of pending terms, possible values: SYSTEM_PENDING for order under Shopee internal processing, KYC_PENDING for order under KYC checking(TW CB order only)

response_parameters.name: order_status
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Enumerated type that defines the current status of the order.

response_parameters.name: shipping_carrier
response_parameters.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items.

response_parameters.name: payment_method
response_parameters.description: The payment method that the buyer selected to pay for the order. Applicable values: See Data Definition- Payment Methods.

response_parameters.name: estimated_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard.

response_parameters.name: message_to_seller
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Message to seller.

response_parameters.name: create_time
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the date and time that the order was created.

response_parameters.name: update_time
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of order, such as order status changed from 'Paid' to 'Completed'.

response_parameters.name: days_to_ship
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Shipping preparation time set by the seller when listing item on Shopee.

response_parameters.name: ship_by_date
response_parameters.description: Return by default. The deadline to ship out the parcel.

response_parameters.name: buyer_user_id
response_parameters.description: The user id of buyer of this order, will be empty if it is a non-integrated order in TW region.

response_parameters.name: buyer_username
response_parameters.description: The name of buyer, will be masked as "****" if it is a non-integrated order in TW region.

response_parameters.name: recipient_address
response_parameters.description: This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address. Different parameters might be masked according to each market and kind of seller. For TW region integrated channel orders will be all masked as "****". More details may refer the announcement.

response_parameters.name: name
response_parameters.description: Recipient's name for the address.

response_parameters.name: phone
response_parameters.description: Recipient's phone number input when order was placed. [Only for TW non-integrated channel] Will return "****" when the "virtual_contact_number" is available

response_parameters.name: town
response_parameters.description: The town of the recipient's address. Whether there is a town will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: district
response_parameters.description: The district of the recipient's address. Whether there is a district will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: city
response_parameters.description: The city of the recipient's address. Whether there is a city will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: state
response_parameters.description: The state/province of the recipient's address. Whether there is a state/province will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: region
response_parameters.description: The two-digit code representing the region of the Recipient.

response_parameters.name: zipcode
response_parameters.description: Recipient's postal code.

response_parameters.name: full_address
response_parameters.sample: C-15-14 BLOK C JALAN 30/146, Asajaya, 40009, Sarawak
response_parameters.description: The full address of the recipient, including country, state, even street, and etc.

response_parameters.name: actual_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The actual shipping fee of the order if available from external logistics partners.

response_parameters.name: goods_to_declare
response_parameters.description: Only work for cross-border order.This value indicates whether the order contains goods that are required to declare at customs. "T" means true and it will mark as "T" on the shipping label; "F" means false and it will mark as "P" on the shipping label. This value is accurate ONLY AFTER the order trackingNo is generated, please capture this value AFTER your retrieve the trackingNo.

response_parameters.name: note
response_parameters.description: The note seller made for own reference.

response_parameters.name: note_update_time
response_parameters.description: Update time for the note.

response_parameters.name: item_list
response_parameters.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for the result of this API call.

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

response_parameters.name: item_name
response_parameters.description: The name of the item.

response_parameters.name: item_sku
response_parameters.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: model_id
response_parameters.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

response_parameters.name: model_name
response_parameters.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer models of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate model. Each model can have a different quantity and price.

response_parameters.name: model_sku
response_parameters.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are models of one item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: model_quantity_purchased
response_parameters.description: The number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

response_parameters.name: model_original_price
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item in the listing currency.

response_parameters.name: model_discounted_price
response_parameters.description: The after-discount price of the item in the listing currency. If there is no discount, this value will be same as that of model_original_price. In case of bundle deal item, this value will return 0 as by design bundle deal discount will not be breakdown to item/model level. Due to technical restriction, the value will return the price before bundle deal if we don't configure it to 0. Please call GetEscrowDetails if you want to calculate item-level discounted price for bundle deal item.

response_parameters.name: wholesale
response_parameters.description: This value indicates whether buyer buy the order item in wholesale price.

response_parameters.name: weight
response_parameters.description: The weight of the item

response_parameters.name: add_on_deal
response_parameters.description: To indicate if this item belongs to an addon deal.

response_parameters.name: main_item
response_parameters.description: To indicate if this item is main item or sub item. True means main item, false means sub item.

response_parameters.name: add_on_deal_id
response_parameters.description: A unique ID to distinguish groups of items in Cart, and Order. (e.g. AddOnDeal)

response_parameters.name: promotion_type
response_parameters.description: Available type：product_promotion, flash_sale, bundle_deal, add_on_deal_main, add_on_deal_sub. For items which attend multiple promotions will only show one promotion, the order of priority is: bundle_deal > add_on_deal_main > add_on_deal_sub > product_promotion >flash_sale

response_parameters.name: promotion_id
response_parameters.description: The ID of the promotion.

response_parameters.name: order_item_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of order item.

response_parameters.name: promotion_group_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of product promotion.

response_parameters.name: image_info
response_parameters.description: Image info of the product.

response_parameters.name: image_url
response_parameters.description: The image url of the product. Default to be variation image, if the model does not have a variation image, will use an item main image instead.

response_parameters.name: product_location_id
response_parameters.description: The fulfilment warehouse ID(s) of the items in the order. (Multi-Warehouse sellers only)

response_parameters.name: is_prescription_item
response_parameters.description: To indicate if this item is prescription item

response_parameters.name: is_b2c_owned_item
response_parameters.description: determine if item is B2C_shop_item It should be `is_b2c_shop_item` but it was a bug from dev. Then now it's is_b2c_owned_item

response_parameters.name: pay_time
response_parameters.description: The time when the order status is updated from UNPAID to PAID. This value is NULL when order is not paid yet.

response_parameters.name: dropshipper
response_parameters.description: For Indonesia orders only. The name of the dropshipper.

response_parameters.name: dropshipper_phone
response_parameters.description: The phone number of dropshipper, could be empty.

response_parameters.name: split_up
response_parameters.description: To indicate whether this order is split to fullfil order(forder) level. Call GetForderInfo if it's "true".

response_parameters.name: buyer_cancel_reason
response_parameters.description: Cancel reason from buyer, could be empty.

response_parameters.name: cancel_by
response_parameters.description: Could be one of buyer, seller, system or Ops.

response_parameters.name: cancel_reason
response_parameters.description: Use this field to get reason for buyer, seller, and system cancellation.

response_parameters.name: actual_shipping_fee_confirmed
response_parameters.description: Use this filed to judge whether the actual_shipping_fee is confirmed.

response_parameters.name: buyer_cpf_id
response_parameters.description: Buyer's CPF number for taxation and invoice purposes. Only for Brazil order.

response_parameters.name: fulfillment_flag
response_parameters.description: Use this field to indicate the order is fulfilled by shopee or seller. Applicable values: fulfilled_by_shopee, fulfilled_by_cb_seller, fulfilled_by_local_seller.

response_parameters.name: pickup_done_time
response_parameters.description: The timestamp when pickup is done.

response_parameters.name: package_list
response_parameters.description: The list of package under an order

response_parameters.name: package_number
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

response_parameters.name: logistics_status
response_parameters.description: The Shopee logistics status for the order. Applicable values: See Data Definition-LogisticsStatus.

response_parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
response_parameters.description: The identity of logistic channel.

response_parameters.name: shipping_carrier
response_parameters.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items.

response_parameters.name: allow_self_design_awb
response_parameters.description: To indicate whether the package allows for self-designed AWB, if allow_self_design_awb returns false, it means that the package does not allow for self-designed AWB and only the system-AWB can be used.

response_parameters.name: item_list
response_parameters.description: The lis of items.

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

response_parameters.name: model_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a model.

response_parameters.name: model_quantity
response_parameters.description: The number of identical items/variations purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

response_parameters.name: order_item_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

response_parameters.name: promotion_group_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of product promotion.

response_parameters.name: product_location_id
response_parameters.description: The warehouse ID of the item.

response_parameters.name: parcel_chargeable_weight
response_parameters.description: display weight used to calculate ASF for this parcel

response_parameters.name: group_shipment_id
response_parameters.description: The common identifier for multiple orders combined in the same parcel.

response_parameters.name: virtual_contact_number
response_parameters.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The virtual phone number to contact the recipient.

response_parameters.name: package_query_number
response_parameters.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The query number used in virtual phone number calls to contact the recipient of this package.

response_parameters.name: invoice_data
response_parameters.description: The invoice data of the order.

response_parameters.name: number
response_parameters.description: The number of the invoice.

response_parameters.name: series_number
response_parameters.description: The series number of the invoice.

response_parameters.name: access_key
response_parameters.description: The access key of the invoice.

response_parameters.name: issue_date
response_parameters.description: The issue date of the invoice.

response_parameters.name: total_value
response_parameters.description: The total value of the invoice.

response_parameters.name: products_total_value
response_parameters.description: The products total value of the invoice.

response_parameters.name: tax_code
response_parameters.description: The tax code for the invoice.

response_parameters.name: checkout_shipping_carrier
response_parameters.description: For non masking order, the logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items. For masking order, the logistics service type that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items.

response_parameters.name: reverse_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: Shopee charges the reverse shipping fee for the returned order.The value of this field will be non-negative.

response_parameters.name: order_chargeable_weight_gram
response_parameters.description: display weight used to calculate ASF for this order

response_parameters.name: prescription_images
response_parameters.description: Return prescription images of this order, only for ID and PH whitelist sellers. Please add the prefix to review: for ID: https://cf.shopee.co.id/file/+prescription_image for PH:https://cf.shopee.ph/file/+prescription_image

response_parameters.name: prescription_check_status
response_parameters.description: enum OrderPrescriptionCheckStatus: NONE = 0; PASSED = 1; FAILED = 2; Only for ID and PH whitelist sellers.

response_parameters.name: edt_from
response_parameters.description: Earliest estimated delivery date of orders (only available for BR region)

response_parameters.name: edt_to
response_parameters.description: Latest estimated delivery time of orders (only available for BR region)

response_parameters.name: booking_sn
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for a booking. Only returned for advance fulfilment matched order only.

response_parameters.name: advance_package
response_parameters.description: Indicate whether order will be fulfilled using advance fulfilment stock or not. If value is true, order will be matched with a booking and seller should not arrange shipment.

response_parameters.name: return_request_due_date
response_parameters.description: This field represents the deadline for buyers to initiate returns and refunds after order is completed. The “return_request_due_date” response parameter will be returned if the requested order meets ALL the conditions below: - The status of the order is COMPLETED - The return refund eligibility of the order is true If you have any questions related to the function of "returns and refunds after order is completed," please refer to the following link: https://seller.shopee.tw/edu/article/18474

response_parameters.name: warning
response_parameters.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

v2.order.get_shipment_list.description: Use this api to get order detail.

request_parameters.name: cursor
request_parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is "". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: order_list
response_parameters.description: The list of shipment orders

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: package_number
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order

response_parameters.name: more
response_parameters.description: This is to indicate whether the order list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve orders.

response_parameters.name: next_cursor
response_parameters.description: If more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error_codes.error_description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.
System error. Please try again later.
There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/order/get_shipment_list?access_token=access_token&cursor=%22%22&page_size=20&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

v2.order.search_package_list.description: Use this api to get order list which order_status is READY_TO_SHIP to start process the whole shipping progress.

request_parameters.name: package_status
request_parameters.description: Use this field to filter the packages of specific status. Applicable values: 0: All 1: Pending 2: ToProcess 3: Processed Default value = 2 (ToProcess)

request_parameters.name: product_location_ids
request_parameters.description: List of product_location_id. Use this field to filter the packages under specific warehouses.

request_parameters.name: logistics_channel_ids
request_parameters.description: List of logistics_channel_id. Use this field to filter the packages under specific logistics channels.

request_parameters.name: fulfillment_type
request_parameters.description: Use this field to filter the packages fulfilled by shopee or seller. Applicable values: 0: None (not apply filter) 1: Shopee 2: Seller Default value = 2 (Seller)

request_parameters.name: invoice_pending
request_parameters.description: Use this field to filter the packages under invoice_pending. Default value = false

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

request_parameters.name: cursor
request_parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is "". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

request_parameters.name: sort_type
request_parameters.description: Use this field to specify which field to use to sort the returned package list. Available values: 1: ShipByDate 2: CreateDate 3: ConfirmedDate Default value = 1 (ShipByDate)

request_parameters.name: ascending
request_parameters.description: Use this field to specify whether the returned package list is sorted in ascending or descending sort_type. Default value = true

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: mesage
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: package_number
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order

response_parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
response_parameters.description: The identity of logistic channel.

response_parameters.name: product_location_id
response_parameters.description: Just use this field to pass the next step of Mass ArrangeShipment

response_parameters.name: total_count
response_parameters.description: Total orders can be returned with your query

response_parameters.name: next_cursor
response_parameters.description: if packages is not empty or length of packages <= page_size. You should pass the next_cursor in the next request as page_sentinel.

response_parameters.name: more
response_parameters.description: To indicate, it's a the last page or not

response_parameters.name: sort
response_parameters.description: As same as request param

response_parameters.name: sort_type
response_parameters.description: As same as request param

response_parameters.name: is_asc
response_parameters.description: As same as request param

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

v2.order.get_package_detail.description: Use this API to search the list of packages that have not been SHIPPED to proceed arranging shipment, and it supports various filters and sort fields.

request_parameters.name: package_number_list
request_parameters.description: The set of package_number. If there are multiple package_number, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: package_list
response_parameters.description: The list of packages.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: package_number
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

response_parameters.name: fulfillment_status
response_parameters.description: The Shopee fulfillment status for the package. Applicable values: See V2.0 Data Definition - PackageFulfillmentStatus.

response_parameters.name: update_time
response_parameters.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of package.

response_parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
response_parameters.description: The identity of logistic channel.

response_parameters.name: shipping_carrier
response_parameters.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the package to deliver items.

response_parameters.name: allow_self_design_awb
response_parameters.description: To indicate whether the package allows for self-designed AWB, if allow_self_design_awb returns false, it means that the package does not allow for self-designed AWB and only the system-AWB can be used.

response_parameters.name: days_to_ship
response_parameters.description: Shipping preparation time set by the seller when listing item on Shopee.

response_parameters.name: ship_by_date
response_parameters.description: The deadline to ship out the package.

response_parameters.name: pending_terms
response_parameters.description: The list of pending terms, possible values: SYSTEM_PENDING for order under Shopee internal processing, KYC_PENDING for order under KYC checking(TW CB order only)

response_parameters.name: tracking_number
response_parameters.description: The tracking number of this package.

response_parameters.name: tracking_number_expiration_date
response_parameters.description: [TW only] Tracking number expiration date

response_parameters.name: pickup_done_time
response_parameters.description: The timestamp when pickup is done.

response_parameters.name: is_split_up
response_parameters.description: To indicate whether this parcel is split.

response_parameters.name: item_list
response_parameters.description: The lis of items in the package.

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

response_parameters.name: model_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a model.

response_parameters.name: item_sku
response_parameters.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: model_sku
response_parameters.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

response_parameters.name: model_quantity
response_parameters.description: The number of identical items/variations purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

response_parameters.name: order_item_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

response_parameters.name: promotion_group_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of product promotion.

response_parameters.name: product_location_id
response_parameters.description: The warehouse ID of the item.

response_parameters.name: recipient_address
response_parameters.description: This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address. Different parameters might be masked according to each market and kind of seller. For TW region integrated channel orders will be all masked as "****". More details may refer the announcement.

response_parameters.name: name
response_parameters.description: Recipient's name for the address.

response_parameters.name: phone
response_parameters.description: Recipient's phone number input when order was placed. [Only for TW non-integrated channel] Will return "****" when the "virtual_contact_number" is available

response_parameters.name: town
response_parameters.description: The town of the recipient's address. Whether there is a town will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: district
response_parameters.description: The district of the recipient's address. Whether there is a district will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: city
response_parameters.description: The city of the recipient's address. Whether there is a city will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: state
response_parameters.description: The state/province of the recipient's address. Whether there is a state/province will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: region
response_parameters.description: The two-digit code representing the region of the Recipient.

response_parameters.name: zipcode
response_parameters.description: Recipient's postal code.

response_parameters.name: full_address
response_parameters.description: The full address of the recipient, including country, state, even street, and etc.

response_parameters.name: parcel_chargeable_weight_gram
response_parameters.description: display weight used to calculate ASF for this parcel

response_parameters.name: group_shipment_id
response_parameters.description: The common identifier for multiple orders combined in the same parcel.

response_parameters.name: virtual_contact_number
response_parameters.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The virtual phone number to contact the recipient.

response_parameters.name: package_query_number
response_parameters.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The query number used in virtual phone number calls to contact the recipient of this package.

response_parameters.name: warning
response_parameters.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

error_codes.error_description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.
System error. Please try again later.

v2.order.split_order.description: Use this api to get package detail.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_parameters.name: package_list
request_parameters.description: The list of packages that you want to split

request_parameters.name: item_list
request_parameters.description: The list of items under the same package.

request_parameters.name: item_id
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

request_parameters.name: model_id
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a model of an item.

request_parameters.name: order_item_id
request_parameters.description: The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

request_parameters.name: promotion_group_id
request_parameters.description: The identify of product promotion.It's required for add on deal and bundle deal items. For items in one same add on deal or bundle deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should share the same id. For items not in add on deal or bundle deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should be 0. And the data is from promotion_group_id of v2,order.get_order_detail.

request_parameters.name: model_quantity
request_parameters.description: The number of identical items put in the package, the quantity sum of the same item from each parcel must be the full item quantity of the whole order. This field is only eligible for the shop whitelisted to the unit-level split in SG/TH/TW/MY markets.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: package_list
response_parameters.description: The list of package under this order you have split.

response_parameters.name: package_number
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

response_parameters.name: item_list
response_parameters.description: The list of items under this package.

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

response_parameters.name: model_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a model.

response_parameters.name: order_item_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

response_parameters.name: promotion_group_id
response_parameters.description: The identify of product promotion. For items in one same add on deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should share the same id. For items not in add on deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should be 0. And the data is from group_id of shopee.orders.GetOrderDetails.

response_parameters.name: model_quantity
response_parameters.description: The number of identical items put in the package.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

v2.order.cancel_order.description: Use this api to cancel an order. This action can only be performed before an order has been shipped.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_parameters.name: cancel_reason
request_parameters.description: The reason seller want to cancel this order. Applicable values: OUT_OF_STOCK, UNDELIVERABLE_AREA(only apply for TW and MY).

request_parameters.name: item_list
request_parameters.description: Required when cancel_reason is OUT_OF_STOCK.

request_parameters.name: item_id
request_parameters.description: Id of item.

request_parameters.name: model_id
request_parameters.description: Id of the model that belongs to the same item.

response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: update_time
response_parameters.description: The time when the order is updated.

<?php

  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/order/cancel_order?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',

v2.order.get_booking_list.description: For multi-warehouse shops, return all warehouses with packages that have not been SHIPPED including product_location_id and address_id. Compared to v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail, it covers some edge cases like warehouse that have been unlinked but still retain packages that have not been SHIPPED, and does not cover some cases like single warehouse with default product_location_id and FBS shop.

request_parameters.name: time_range_field
request_parameters.description: The kind of time_from and time_to. Available value: create_time, update_time.

request_parameters.name: time_from
request_parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving bookings (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: time_to
request_parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving bookings (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

request_parameters.name: cursor
request_parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is "". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

request_parameters.name: booking_status
request_parameters.description: The booking_status filter for retrieving bookings and each one only every request. Available value: READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/CANCELLED/MATCHED

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail information you are querying.

response_parameters.name: more
response_parameters.description: This is to indicate whether the booking list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve bookings.

response_parameters.name: booking_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. Only return if booking_status is MATCHED.

response_parameters.name: booking_status
response_parameters.description: The booking_status filter for retrieving booking and each one only every request. Available value: READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/CANCELLED/MATCHED

response_parameters.name: next_cursor
response_parameters.description: If more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.

request_parameters.description: The set of booking_sn. If there are multiple booking_sn, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]

request_parameters.name: response_optional_fields
request_parameters.description: The response fields you want to get. Please select from the below response parameters. If you input an object field, all the params under it will be included automatically in the response. If there are multiple response fields you want to get, you need to use English comma to connect them. Available values: item_list,cancel_by,cancel_reason,fulfillment_flag,pickup_done_time,shipping_carrier, recipient_address, dropshipper, dropshipper_phone

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail information you are querying.

response_parameters.name: booking_list
response_parameters.description: The list of bookings.

response_parameters.name: booking_sn
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. Only return if booking_status is MATCHED.

response_parameters.name: region
response_parameters.description: Return by default. The two-digit code representing the region where the booking was made.

response_parameters.name: booking_status
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Enumerated type that defines the current status of the booking. Available value: READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/CANCELLED/MATCHED

response_parameters.name: match_status
response_parameters.description: MATCH_PENDING/MATCH_SUCCESSFUL/MATCH_FAILED

response_parameters.name: shipping_carrier
response_parameters.description: The logistics service provider that will deliver the booking.

response_parameters.name: create_time
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the date and time that the booking was created.

response_parameters.name: update_time
response_parameters.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of booking, such as booking status changed from 'Processed' to 'Shipped'.

response_parameters.name: ship_by_date
response_parameters.description: Return by default. The deadline to ship out the parcel.

response_parameters.name: recipient_address
response_parameters.description: This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address.

response_parameters.name: name
response_parameters.description: Recipient's name for the address.

response_parameters.name: phone
response_parameters.description: Recipient's phone number input when booking was placed.

response_parameters.name: town
response_parameters.description: The town of the recipient's address. Whether there is a town will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: district
response_parameters.description: The district of the recipient's address. Whether there is a district will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: city
response_parameters.description: The city of the recipient's address. Whether there is a city will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: state
response_parameters.description: The state/province of the recipient's address. Whether there is a state/province will depend on the region and/or country.

response_parameters.name: region
response_parameters.description: The two-digit code representing the region of the Recipient.

response_parameters.name: zipcode
response_parameters.description: Recipient's postal code.

response_parameters.name: full_address
response_parameters.sample: C-15-14 BLOK C JALAN 30/146, Asajaya, 40009, Sarawak
response_parameters.description: The full address of the recipient, including country, state, even street, and etc.

response_parameters.name: item_list
response_parameters.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for the result of this API call.

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

response_parameters.name: item_name
response_parameters.description: The name of the item.

response_parameters.name: item_sku
response_parameters.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: model_id
response_parameters.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

response_parameters.name: model_name
response_parameters.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer models of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate model. Each model can have a different quantity and price.

response_parameters.name: model_sku
response_parameters.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are models of one item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: model_quantity_purchased
response_parameters.description: The number of identical items from one listing/item in the same booking.

response_parameters.name: weight
response_parameters.description: The weight of the item

response_parameters.name: product_location_id
response_parameters.description: The fulfilment warehouse ID(s) of the items in the booking. (Multi-Warehouse sellers only)

response_parameters.name: image_info
response_parameters.description: Image info of the product.

response_parameters.name: image_url
response_parameters.description: The image url of the product. Default to be variation image, if the model does not have a variation image, will use an item main image instead.

response_parameters.name: dropshipper
response_parameters.description: For Indonesia bookings only. The name of the dropshipper.

response_parameters.name: dropshipper_phone
response_parameters.description: The phone number of dropshipper, could be empty.

response_parameters.name: cancel_by
response_parameters.description: Could be one of buyer, seller, system or Ops.

response_parameters.name: cancel_reason
response_parameters.description: Use this field to get reason for buyer, seller, and system cancellation.

response_parameters.name: fulfillment_flag
response_parameters.description: Use this field to indicate the booking is fulfilled by shopee or seller. Applicable values: fulfilled_by_shopee, fulfilled_by_cb_seller, fulfilled_by_local_seller.

response_parameters.name: pickup_done_time
response_parameters.description: The timestamp when pickup is done.

response_parameters.name: warning
response_parameters.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://open.admin.uat.shopee.io/api/v2/order/get_booking_detail?access_token=access_token&booking_sn_list=201214JAJXU6G7%2C201214JASXYXY6&partner_id=partner_id&response_optional_fields=total_amount&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',

  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'

));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter.description: Use this api to get booking detail.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_parameters.name: package_number
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: info_needed
response_parameters.description: The parameters required based on each specific order to Init. Must use the fields included under info_needed to call Init. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

response_parameters.name: dropoff
response_parameters.description: Could contain 'branch_id', 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'branch_id', choose one to Init. If it contains 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include "dropoff" field in Init API.Could contain 'slug'.If it contains 'slug', to return selected 3PL partner only for TW C2C sellers to drop-off parcels with.

response_parameters.name: pickup
response_parameters.description: Could contain 'address_id' and 'pickup_time_id'. Choose one address_id and its corresponding pickup_time_id to Init. If it has empty value, developer should still include "pickup" field in Init API.It could contains "tracking_number" returned from "info_need"for some channels, please also add it when init.

response_parameters.name: non_integrated
response_parameters.description: Could contain 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include "non-integrated" field in Init API.

v2.logistics.get_mass_shipping_parameter.description: Use this api to get the parameter "info_needed" from the response to check if the order has pickup or dropoff or no integrate options. This api will also return the addresses and pickup time id options for the pickup method. For dropoff, it can return branch id, sender real name etc, depending on the 3PL requirements.

request_parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
request_parameters.description: The API can only batch request the shipping parameter for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. Use this field to specify the logistics_channel_id for the request. If not specified, will use the logistics_channel_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

request_parameters.name: product_location_id
request_parameters.description: The API can only batch request the shipping parameter for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. Use this field to specify the product_location_id for the request. If not specified, will use the product_location_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

v2.logistics.ship_order.description: Use this api to get the parameter "info_needed" from the response to check if the order has pickup or dropoff or no integrate options. This api will also return the addresses and pickup time id options for the pickup method. For dropoff, it can return branch id, sender real name etc, depending on the 3PL requirements. The API can only batch request the shipping parameter for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_parameters.name: package_number
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

request_parameters.name: pickup
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if get_shipping_parameter returns "pickup" under "info_needed". Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

request_parameters.name: address_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of address. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter.

request_parameters.name: pickup_time_id
request_parameters.description: The pickup time id. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter, you can only select one from the time_slot_list. Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

request_parameters.name: dropoff
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if get_shipping_parameter returns "dropoff" under "info_needed". Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

request_parameters.name: branch_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of branch.

request_parameters.name: sender_real_name
request_parameters.description: The real name of sender.

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

request_parameters.name: slug
request_parameters.description: The selected 3PL partner to drop-off parcels with.

request_parameters.name: non_integrated
request_parameters.description: Optional parameter when get_shipping_parameter returns "non-integrated" under "info_needed".

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

v2.logistics.mass_ship_order.description: Use this api to initiate logistics including arrange pickup, dropoff or shipment for non-integrated logistic channels. Should call v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter to fetch all required param first. It's recommended to initiate logistics one hour after the orders were placed since there is one-hour window buyer can cancel any order without request to seller.

request_parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
request_parameters.description: The API can only batch arrange shipment for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. Use this field to specify the logistics_channel_id for the request. If not specified, will use the logistics_channel_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

request_parameters.name: product_location_id
request_parameters.description: The API can only batch arrange shipment for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. Use this field to specify the product_location_id for the request. If not specified, will use the product_location_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

request_parameters.name: package_list
request_parameters.description: The list of packages you want to arrange shipment. limit [1, 50].

request_parameters.name: package_number
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

request_parameters.name: pickup
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "pickup" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "pickup" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

request_parameters.name: address_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of address.

request_parameters.name: pickup_time_id
request_parameters.description: The pickup time id. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_mass_shipping_parameter, you can only select one from the time_slot_list. Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

request_parameters.name: dropoff
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "dropoff" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "dropoff" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

request_parameters.name: branch_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of branch.

request_parameters.name: sender_real_name
request_parameters.description: The real name of sender.

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

request_parameters.name: non_integrated
request_parameters.description: Optional parameter when get_mass_shipping_parameter returns "non-integrated" under "info_needed".

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

request_parameters.name: package_number
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: success_list
response_parameters.description: Success package list.

response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

v2.logistics.update_shipping_order.description: Use this api to initiate logistics including arrange pickup, dropoff or shipment for non-integrated logistic channels. Should call v2.logistics.get_mass_shipping_parameter to fetch all required params first. It's recommended to initiate logistics one hour after the orders were placed since there is one-hour window buyer can cancel any order without request to seller. <?php

));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

v2.logistics.download_shipping_document.description: Use this api to retrieve the status of the shipping document task. Document will be available for download only after the status change to 'READY'.

request_parameters.name: shipping_document_type
request_parameters.description: The type of shipping document. Available values: NORMAL_AIR_WAYBILL,THERMAL_AIR_WAYBILL,NORMAL_JOB_AIR_WAYBILL,THERMAL_JOB_AIR_WAYBILL

request_parameters.name: order_list
request_parameters.description: The list of orders you need to download it's shipping document.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_parameters.name: package_number
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

response_parameters.name: waybill
response_parameters.description: The waybill file.

v2.logistics.get_shipping_document_data_.description: Use this api to download shipping_document. You have to call v2.logistics.create_shipping_document to create a new shipping document task first and call v2.logistics.get_shipping_document_resut to get the task status second. If the task is READY, you can download this shipping document.

request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_parameters.name: package_number
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You shouldn't fill the field with empty string when there isn't a package number.

response_parameters.name: error

response_parameters.name: order_weight
response_parameters.description: Use this field to indicate order weight when calculate the shipping fee. The unit of weigh is gram.

response_parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
response_parameters.description: The identity of logistic channel.

response_parameters.name: shipping_carrier
response_parameters.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items.

response_parameters.name: service_code
response_parameters.description: Only work for cross-border order. This code is required at some sorting hub. Please ensure the service_code is INCLUDED on your shipping label, otherwise the parcel cannot be processed by the warehouse. If you didn't retrieve service_code after you first called this API, please try few more times within 30 minutes.

response_parameters.name: first_mile_name
response_parameters.description: Only work for cross-border order.The name of the carrier ships cross country or region.

response_parameters.name: last_mile_name
response_parameters.description: Only work for cross-border order.The name of the carrier delivers the parcels in local country or region.

response_parameters.name: goods_to_declare
response_parameters.description: Only work for cross-border order.This value indicates whether the order contains goods that are required to declare at customs. "T" means true and it will mark as "T" on the shipping label; "F" means false and it will mark as "P" on the shipping label. This value is accurate ONLY AFTER the order trackingNo is generated, please capture this value AFTER your retrieve the trackingNo.

response_parameters.name: lane_code
response_parameters.description: Only work for cross-border order. The string use for waybill printing. The format is "S - region_code and lane_number". For example, S-TH01, S-TH02

response_parameters.name: mutual_check
response_parameters.description: only apply for ID/VN shops. mutual_check indicates whether the parcel is eligible for Return-on-the-Spot (RoS) co-check. If mutual_check=1, then the parcel is RoS eligible, where drivers and buyers can co-check the parcel. Buyer can then choose to accept or reject the parcel on the spot. If mutual_check=0, then the parcel is ineligible for RoS.

response_parameters.name: dely_fri_label
response_parameters.description: Probability of Successful Friday Delivery. The value of L(low), M(medium), H(high) represent the chances of successful delivery attempts on Friday.

response_parameters.name: dely_sat_label
response_parameters.description: Probability of Successful Saturday Delivery The value of L(low), M(medium), H(high) represent the chances of successful delivery attempts on Saturday.

response_parameters.name: dely_sun_label
response_parameters.description: Probability of Successful Sunday Delivery. The value of L(low), M(medium), H(high) represent the chances of successful delivery attempts on Sunday.

response_parameters.name: pickup_code
response_parameters.description: For drivers to quickly identify parcel to be picked up. Only returned for ID and TH local orders which use instant+sameday for delivery.

curl --location --request POST 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/update_channel?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&access_token=access_token&timestamp=timestamp&shop_id=shop_id' \

}'
request_example.python:
import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/update_channel?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "cod_enabled": True,
  "enabled": True,
  "logistics_channel_id": 14623,
  "preferred": True
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.request("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)

request_example.php:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/get_operating_hour_restrictions?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

v2.logistics.update_operating_hours.description: This API is designed to retrieve all restrictions related to inputting operating hours for the v2.logistics.update_operating_hours function. This API ensures that user are aware of any limitations or conditions that may affect their operating hours.

v2.logistics.delete_special_operating_ho.description: This API is designed to allow sellers to update their operating hours. It is essential that the values provided in this API align with the restrictions retrieved from the v2.logistics.get_operating_hour_restrictions API to ensure compliance with platform requirements. This API uses overwriting updates, when updating pickup operating hours, still need to include all parts even those not needing changes.

v2.logistics.batch_update_tpf_warehouse_.description: This API is used to delete a specific special operating hour for a seller. This API allows sellers to manage their operating hours by removing any special operating hours that are no longer needed. To use this API, the name of the special operating hour to be deleted should be obtained from the v2.logistics.get_operating_hours API.

request_parameters.name: tpf_name
request_parameters.description: The name of 3PF Warehouse Vendor. Prohibit pure numbers and excessive abbreviations. Standardize naming for easy business recognition. Input priority: warehouse English name > full pinyin of warehouse brand name > warehouse Chinese name > other officially recognized and prominent names.

request_parameters.description: The 3PF tracking status for the timestamp. All statuses are in lower case. List of status: - 3pf_warehouse_order_created - 3pf_warehouse_outbound_done

v2.logistics.batch_ship_order.description: For CB orders that fulfilled by 3PF, support 3PF Warehouse Vendors to update the tpf_tracking_status when 3PF warehouse receive the order and complete the outbound of the package. CB orders that fulfilled by 3PF： v2.shop.get_shop_info - shop_fulfillment_flag in {Pure - 3PF Shop,PFF - 3PF Shop,LFF Hybrid Shop} And v2.order.get_order_detail - fulfillment_flag = fulfilled_by_local_seller

request_parameters.name: order_list
request_parameters.description: The list of order.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. Limit 150.

request_parameters.name: package_number
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

request_parameters.name: pickup
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "pickup" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "pickup" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

request_parameters.name: address_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of address. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetAddress.

request_parameters.name: pickup_time_id
request_parameters.description: The pickup time id. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetTimeSlot.

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

request_parameters.name: dropoff
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "dropoff" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "dropoff" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

request_parameters.name: branch_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of branch. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetBranch branch.

request_parameters.name: sender_real_name
request_parameters.description: The real name of sender.

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

request_parameters.name: non_integrated
request_parameters.description: Optional parameter when GetParameterForInit returns "non-integrated" or GetLogisticsInfo returns "non-integrated" under "info_needed".

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

v2.logistics.update_tracking_status.description: Use this api to batch initiate logistics including arrange pickup, dropoff or shipment for non-integrated logistic channels. Should call v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter to fetch all required param first. It's recommended to initiate logistics one hour after the orders were placed since there is one-hour window buyer can cancel any order without request to seller.Only channel 90003 - Padrão in Brazil has the permission of this API.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

request_parameters.name: tracking_number
request_parameters.description: Order tracking number, might help seller to identify his order on the tracking_URL. Can only be sent when updating order status to "logistic_pickup_done".

request_parameters.name: tracking_url
request_parameters.description: Website's URL for order tracking with maximum length of 2048 characters. Can only be sent when updating order status to "logistic_pickup_done".

request_parameters.name: logistics_status
request_parameters.description: Order status update support: - logistics_pickup_done - logistics_delivery_done - logistics_delivery_failed

v2.logistics.get_booking_shipping_parame.description: Only available for Brazil sellers. This API is only available for orders/parcels which are fulfilled by seller's logistics (or "Logística do Vendedor"), or logistic_channel_id: 90021. OFG status can be updated to - Shipped (pickup_done) - Delivered (delivery_done) - Delivery Failed (delivery_failed) (Do not allow passing tracking number &/or tracking URL without status update to logistic_pickup_done)

request_parameters.name: booking_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detail information you are querying.

response_parameters.name: info_needed
response_parameters.description: The parameters required based on each specific booking to Init. Must use the fields included under info_needed to call Init.

response_parameters.name: dropoff
response_parameters.description: Could contain 'branch_id', 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'branch_id', choose one to Init. If it contains 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include "dropoff" field in Init API.

response_parameters.name: pickup
response_parameters.description: Could contain 'address_id' and 'pickup_time_id'. Choose one address_id and its corresponding pickup_time_id to Init. If it has empty value, developer should still include "pickup" field in Init API.It could contains "tracking_number" returned from "info_need"for some channels, please also add it when init.

v2.logistics.ship_booking.description: Use this api to get the parameter "info_needed" from the response to check if the booking has pickup or dropoff. This api will also return the addresses and pickup time id options for the pickup method. For dropoff, it can return branch id, sender real name etc, depending on the 3PL requirements.

request_parameters.name: booking_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

request_parameters.name: pickup
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if get_shipping_parameter returns "pickup" under "info_needed". Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

request_parameters.name: address_id
request_parameters.description: The identity of address. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_booking_shipping_parameter.

request_parameters.name: pickup_time_id
request_parameters.description: The pickup time id. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_shipping_booking_parameter, you can only select one from the time_slot_list. Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

request_parameters.name: dropoff
request_parameters.description: Required parameter ONLY if get_shipping_parameter returns "dropoff" under "info_needed". Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.
