v2.payment.get_escrow_detail.description: Use this api to get first mile channel list.

request_parameters.name: order_sn
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

response_parameters.name: buyer_user_name
response_parameters.description: The username of buyer.

response_parameters.name: return_order_sn_list
response_parameters.description: The list of the serial number of return.

response_parameters.name: escrow_amount
response_parameters.description: The total amount that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order is completed. For non cb sip affiliate shop (new formula): escrow_amount= original_cost_of_goods_sold-original_shopee_discount+seller_return_refund+ shopee_discount- voucher_from_seller- seller_coin_cash_back+ buyer_paid_shipping_fee- actual_shipping_fee+ shopee_shipping_rebate+ shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl- reverse_shipping_fee+ rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount- final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee- seller_transaction_fee- service_fee- commission_fee- campaign_fee- shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount- delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount-final_escrow_product_gst- order_ams_commission_fee- escrow_tax-sales_tax_on_lvg-reverse_shipping_fee_sst-shipping_fee_sst-withholding_tax-overseas_return_service_fee-vat_on_imported_goods For cb sip affiliate shop: escrow_amount=escrow_amount_pri * exchange_rate note: Return refund amount = if adjustable RR, will equal to drc_adjustable_refund

response_parameters.name: buyer_total_amount
response_parameters.description: The snapshot value of total amount that paid by buyer at checkout moment.

response_parameters.name: order_original_price
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

response_parameters.name: original_price
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

response_parameters.name: order_discounted_price
response_parameters.description: The total discounted price for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: order_selling_price
response_parameters.description: This field value = sum of item unit price.selling price comes from the sum up of each item's unit price. For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like order_original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo.It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: order_seller_discount
response_parameters.description: The total discount seller provided for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_discount
response_parameters.description: Final sum of each item seller discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: shopee_discount
response_parameters.description: Final sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. This amount will rebate to seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate order. )

response_parameters.name: voucher_from_seller
response_parameters.description: Final value of voucher provided by Seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: voucher_from_shopee
response_parameters.description: Final value of voucher provided by Shopee for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: coins
response_parameters.description: This value indicates the total amount offset when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: buyer_paid_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: buyer_transaction_fee
response_parameters.description: Tansaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: cross_border_tax
response_parameters.description: Amount incurred by Buyer for purchasing items outside of home country or region. Amount may change after Return Refund. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: payment_promotion
response_parameters.description: The amount offset via payment promotion. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: commission_fee
response_parameters.description: The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable. For cb sip affiliate shop: commission_fee=commission_fee_pri * exchange_rate

response_parameters.name: service_fee
response_parameters.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services. For cb sip affiliate shop: service_fee=service_fee_pri * exchange_rate For tw shop, there will be pre-order service fee included

response_parameters.name: seller_transaction_fee
response_parameters.description: Tansaction fee paid by seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_lost_compensation
response_parameters.description: Compensation to seller in case of lost parcel. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_coin_cash_back
response_parameters.description: Value of coins provided by Seller for purchasing with his or her store for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: escrow_tax
response_parameters.description: Cross-border tax imposed by the Indonesian government on sellers. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: estimated_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: final_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: Final adjusted amount that seller has to bear as part of escrow. This amount could be negative or positive. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: actual_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The final shipping cost of order and it is positive. For Non-integrated logistics channel is 0. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee_sst
response_parameters.description: The Service Tax charged on Seller Paid Shipping Fee for forward shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. Definition of Seller Paid Shipping Fee is Actual Shipping Fee subtracted by sum of Shipping Fee Paid by Buyer and Shipping Rebate From Shopee. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

response_parameters.name: order_chargeable_weight
response_parameters.description: For CB shop, display weight used to calculate actual_shipping_fee for this order.

response_parameters.name: shopee_shipping_rebate
response_parameters.description: The platform shipping subsidy to the seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl
response_parameters.description: The discount of shipping fee from 3PL. Currently only applicable to ID. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_shipping_discount
response_parameters.description: The shipping discount defined by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_voucher_code
response_parameters.description: The list of voucher code provided by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: drc_adjustable_refund
response_parameters.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center.

response_parameters.name: cost_of_goods_sold
response_parameters.description: Final amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: original_cost_of_goods_sold
response_parameters.description: Amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: original_shopee_discount
response_parameters.description: Sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_return_refund
response_parameters.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return.

response_parameters.name: items
response_parameters.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for all the items in this order, including regular items(non-activity) and activity items.

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: ID of item

response_parameters.name: item_name
response_parameters.description: Name of item

response_parameters.name: item_sku
response_parameters.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: model_id
response_parameters.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

response_parameters.name: model_name
response_parameters.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer variations of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate variation. Each variation can have a different quantity and price.

response_parameters.name: model_sku
response_parameters.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are variations of one item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: original_price
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

response_parameters.name: original_price_pri
response_parameters.description: The agreed settlement price of items used as settlement basis, amount is in the primary currency. (Only display for CB SIP affiliate shop.)

response_parameters.name: selling_price
response_parameters.description: For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like item original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1 (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop.)

response_parameters.name: discounted_price
response_parameters.description: The after-discount price of the item in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. If there is no discount, this value will be the same as that of original_price.

response_parameters.name: seller_discount
response_parameters.description: The discount provided by seller for this item

response_parameters.name: shopee_discount
response_parameters.description: The discount provided by Shopee for this item

response_parameters.name: discount_from_coin
response_parameters.description: The offset of this item when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. In case of bundle deal item, this value will return 0. Due to technical restriction, this field will return incorrect value under bundle deal case if we don’t configure it to 0.

response_parameters.name: discount_from_voucher_shopee
response_parameters.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use Shopee voucher.

response_parameters.name: discount_from_voucher_seller
response_parameters.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use seller-specific voucher.

response_parameters.name: activity_type
response_parameters.description: The type of the item, default is "". If the item is a bundle item the value is "bundle_deal", and if a add on deal item, the value is "add_on_deal"

response_parameters.name: activity_id
response_parameters.description: If bundle_deal the is id of bundle deal, if add_on_deal this is id of add on deal.

response_parameters.name: is_main_item
response_parameters.description: Meaning a main or sub item for add_on_deal.

response_parameters.name: quantity_purchased
response_parameters.description: This value indicates the number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

response_parameters.name: is_b2c_shop_item
response_parameters.description: Indicates whether this is a B2C owned item.

response_parameters.name: ams_commission_fee
response_parameters.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee. Applicable for items sold via the Affiliate Program.

response_parameters.name: escrow_amount_pri
response_parameters.description: The total amount in the prim currency that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order completed . escrow_amount_pri=original_price_pri-seller_return_refund_pri-commission_fee_pri-service_fee_pri-drc_adjustable_refund_pri.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

response_parameters.name: buyer_total_amount_pri
response_parameters.description: The total amount that paid by buyer in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

response_parameters.name: original_price_pri
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the primary currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

response_parameters.name: seller_return_refund_pri
response_parameters.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: commission_fee_pri
response_parameters.description: The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: service_fee_pri
response_parameters.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: drc_adjustable_refund_pri
response_parameters.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center in the primary currency after proration. (Only applicable for cb sip affiliate shop.)

response_parameters.name: pri_currency
response_parameters.description: The currency of the country or region where the shop that real seller operates. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: aff_currency
response_parameters.description: The currency of the country or region where shop opened in. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: exchange_rate
response_parameters.description: Exchange rate from primary shop currency to affiliate shop currency.

response_parameters.name: reverse_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: Shopee charges the reverse shipping fee for the returned order.The value of this field will be non-negative.

response_parameters.name: reverse_shipping_fee_sst
response_parameters.description: The Service Tax charged on Reverse Shipping Fee for reverse shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

response_parameters.name: final_product_protection
response_parameters.description: The total amount of product protection purchased during placing an order.

response_parameters.name: credit_card_promotion
response_parameters.description: This value indicate the offset via credit card promotion.

response_parameters.name: credit_card_transaction_fee
response_parameters.description: This value indicate the total transaction fee. credit_card_transaction_fee=buyer_transaction_fee+seller_transaction_fee

response_parameters.name: final_product_vat_tax
response_parameters.description: Value-added Tax is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations . (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: final_shipping_vat_tax
response_parameters.description: Value-added Tax for product price is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: campaign_fee
response_parameters.description: The campaign fee charged by Shopee platform. Only available for some local Indonesian shops.

response_parameters.name: sip_subsidy
response_parameters.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

response_parameters.name: sip_subsidy_pri
response_parameters.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. This value is in the primary currency. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

response_parameters.name: rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount
response_parameters.description: The insurance claim amount if seller opt in to insurance program. this covers Reverse shipping Fee in the case of RR. As per Jun 2024: - For ID & MY Local: After Extension on coverage to FSF due to RR. this claim amount will consist of FSF + RSF claim. - For PH local: This will only cover RSF claim will be updated if there's any RR/cancellation

response_parameters.name: shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount
response_parameters.description: Service fee charged to seller in MY,ID,PH Local (as per Jun 2024) due to additional program purchased.

response_parameters.name: final_escrow_product_gst
response_parameters.description: Goods and Service Tax for product price is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore)

response_parameters.name: final_escrow_shipping_gst
response_parameters.description: Goods and Service Tax for shipping fee is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore.)

response_parameters.name: delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount
response_parameters.description: [Currently apply to ID & local orders only] An insurance premium charged to seller at the time parcel is picked up by 3PL for insurance in case of parcel lost/damaged by 3PL.

response_parameters.name: order_adjustment
response_parameters.description: Order level adjustment transaction information. If the order without adjustment, no returned of the field.

response_parameters.name: amount
response_parameters.description: adjustment transaction amount.

response_parameters.name: date
response_parameters.description: adjustment transaction complete date.

response_parameters.name: currency
response_parameters.description: order level adjustment transaction's currency type.

response_parameters.name: adjustment_reason
response_parameters.description: Reason for adjustment. Possible cases could be: - Return Refund deduction or compensation - logistic issue deduction or compensation - marketing fee deduction - payment related fee

response_parameters.name: total_adjustment_amount
response_parameters.description: Total adjustment made to the order.

response_parameters.name: escrow_amount_after_adjustment
response_parameters.description: Final income seller can get from this order after deduct the order-level adjustment.

response_parameters.name: order_ams_commission_fee
response_parameters.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee for this order. Applicable for orders sold via the Affiliate Program.

response_parameters.name: buyer_payment_method
response_parameters.description: The payment method buyer used when do the order checkout.

response_parameters.name: instalment_plan
response_parameters.description: The instalment plan buyer chosen when do the order checkout. Only applicable when payment method support instalment.

response_parameters.name: sales_tax_on_lvg
response_parameters.description: Sales Tax on Low Value Goods (LVG) is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Malaysia SST regulations for selective orders (e.g. CB LVG orders in MY)

response_parameters.name: final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The amount of fee charged to seller (if any) for the failed delivery order.

response_parameters.name: withholding_tax
response_parameters.description: Only for PH local shops. According to regulations issued by Bureau of Internal Revenue in PH, the Withholding Tax is applied to the gross remittances sent by Shopee to online suppliers of goods and services.

response_parameters.name: overseas_return_service_fee
response_parameters.description: This is overseas return service fee charged to sellers who register ORS program.(Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

response_parameters.name: prorated_coins_value_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated value from cash equivalent of coin offset due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_shopee_voucher_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated refund value from shopee voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_seller_voucher_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated refund value from seller voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_payment_channel_promo_bank_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated value from bank payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_payment_channel_promo_shopee_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated value from shopee payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: fsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount
response_parameters.description: The claim amount given to seller if seller opt in to shipping fee service program. this covers Forward Shipping Fee cost in the case of cancelled due to Failed delivery.

response_parameters.name: vat_on_imported_goods
response_parameters.description: 7% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Thailand. 8% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Vietnam

response_parameters.name: payment_channel_name
response_parameters.description: Name of the payment channel that buyer used in checkout.

response_parameters.name: instalment_plan
response_parameters.description: Tenure information. This will have value if payment channel used has tenure information, such as credit card.

response_parameters.name: buyer_payment_info
response_parameters.description: The buyer payment info at order checkout moment. (snapshot value)

response_parameters.name: buyer_payment_method
response_parameters.description: The payment method used by buyer.

response_parameters.name: buyer_service_fee
response_parameters.description: An additional service fee charged by shopee to Buyer at checkout. currently only applicable to ID region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: buyer_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The tax amount paid by buyer. currently this is a custom tax charged to CB orders in TW,CL,MX

response_parameters.name: buyer_total_amount
response_parameters.description: The total amount paid by buyer at checkout moment.

response_parameters.name: credit_card_promotion
response_parameters.description: The promotion provided by credit card. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: icms_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The icms tax paid by buyer. this is only applicable to BR region it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: import_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The import tax paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: initial_buyer_txn_fee
response_parameters.description: Transaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. ). Most regions would have this fee charged to buyer at checkout depending on the fee rules applied in each region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: insurance_premium
response_parameters.description: The insurance premium paid by buyer. Currently only applicable to some regions like PH, MY, ID, VN, SG and TH it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: iof_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The iof tax paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: is_paid_by_credit_card
response_parameters.description: Whether this order is paid by credit card. it's related to payment channel used at checkout. Value: false,true

response_parameters.name: merchant_subtotal
response_parameters.description: The total item price paid by buyer at checkout. it is an initial value and will not be updated after RR/cancellation

response_parameters.name: seller_voucher
response_parameters.description: The voucher provided by seller to offset some value needs to be paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee_sst_amount
response_parameters.description: The shipping fee sst paid by buyer. Currently apply to MY region only it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shopee_voucher
response_parameters.description: The voucher provided by Shopee to offset the amount need to be paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shopee_coins_redeemed
response_parameters.description: This is an amount of coin used by buyer at checkout to offset some amount to be paid. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Error code

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Error message

request_parameters.name: page_no
request_parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is 0. if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: If many transactions are available to retrieve, you may need to call GetTransactionList multiple times to retrieve all the data. Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Default is 40. Use the Pagination filters to control the maximum number of entries (<= 100) to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), the offset number to start next call. This integer value is usUed to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single ""page"" of data.

request_parameters.name: create_time_from
request_parameters.description: The create_time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the create_time_from and create_time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: create_time_to
request_parameters.description: The create_time_to field is the ending date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the create_time_from and create_time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: wallet_type
request_parameters.description: This field indicates the wallet type.

request_parameters.name: transaction_type
request_parameters.description: Transaction type APIs: ESCROW_VERIFIED_ADD = 101; // Escrow has been verified and paid to seller ESCROW_VERIFIED_MINUS = 102; // Escrow has been verified and charged from seller as escrow amount is negative WITHDRAWAL_CREATED = 201; // The seller has created a withdrawal, so it’s deducted from balance WITHDRAWAL_COMPLETED = 202; // The withdrawal has been completed, so the ongoing amount decreases. WITHDRAWAL_CANCELLED = 203; // The withdrawal has been canceled, so the amount is added back to the seller balance. Ongoing amount decreases as well. ADJUSTMENT_ADD = 401; // One adjustment item has been paid to seller ADJUSTMENT_MINUS = 402; // One adjustment item has been charged from seller FBS_ADJUSTMENT_ADD = 404; //One adjustment item related to Shopee fulfillment order is added to seller FBS_ADJUSTMENT_MINUS = 405; // One adjustment item related to Shopee fulfillment order is deducted from seller ADJUSTMENT_CENTER_ADD = 406; // One adjustment item has been added to seller wallet ADJUSTMENT_CENTER_DEDUCT = 407; // One adjustment item has been deducted from seller wallet FSF_COST_PASSING_DEDUCT = 408; FSF cost passing for canceled/invalid orders PERCEPTION_VAT_TAX_DEDUCT = 409; Extra charge for perception regime VAT tax (Argentina) PERCEPTION_TURNOVER_TAX_DEDUCT = 410; Extra charge for perception regime turnover tax (Argentina) PAID_ADS_CHARGE = 450; // Paid ads are charged from seller PAID_ADS_REFUND = 451; // Paid ads are refunded to seller FAST_ESCROW_DISBURSE = 452; // ADD. // The first disbursement of fast escrow has been paid to seller AFFILIATE_ADS_SELLER_FEE = 455; // DEDUCT // Affiliate ads seller fee is charged from seller AFFILIATE_ADS_SELLER_FEE_REFUND = 456; // ADD // Affiliate ads seller fee is refunded to seller FAST_ESCROW_DEDUCT = 458; // Fast escrow is deducted from seller balance in the event of return and refund FAST_ESCROW_DISBURSE_REMAIN = 459; // The second disbursement of fast escrow has been paid to seller AFFILIATE_FEE_DEDUCT = 460; // Affiliate MKT fee is charged from seller for using affiliate MKT services

request_parameters.name: money_flow
request_parameters.description: It's to indicate whether user wants to only return : MONEY_IN = addition MONEY_OUT = Deduction if not specified, we will return all Note special case for TW JKO Pay, we will ignore Money_flow

request_parameters.name: transaction_tab_type
request_parameters.description: NOTE: Only 1 'transaction tab type' value should be passed in. Passing in more than 1 value (eg: comma separated values) will return default response. This is because the request param treats the value passed in as a single string. This to indicates the updated filtering type that client can use to specify which transaction type we want to return. it will have : Default wallet_order_income wallet_adjustment_filter wallet_wallet_payment wallet_refund_from_order wallet_withdrawals fast_escrow_repayment fast_pay seller_loan corporate_loan pix_transactions_filter open_finance_transactions_filter Note for BR, wallet txn type that linked to pix_transactions_filter and open_finance_transactions_filter are classified as default type tab instead. therefore for Open API client who wants to query these 2 trx can put default as the filter in this type

It will have the following tab types Default wallet_order_income wallet_adjustment_filter wallet_wallet_payment wallet_refund_from_order wallet_withdrawals fast_escrow_repayment fast_pay seller_loan corporate_loan pix_transactions_filter open_finance_transactions_filter Note for BR, currently in SOP live configuration, wallet txn type that linked to pix_transactions_filter and open_finance_transactions_filter are classified as default type tab instead. therefore for Open API client who wants to query these 2 txn can put default as the filter in this type

request_example.php:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://open.admin.uat.shopee.io/api/v2/payment/get_billing_transaction_info?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "billing_transaction_info_type": 1,
    "cursor": "\\"\\"",
    "encrypted_payout_ids": [
        "10376329180766",
        "637926329180767"
    ],
    "page_size": 100
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;
request_example.python:
import requests
import json

url = "https://open.admin.uat.shopee.io/api/v2/payment/get_billing_transaction_info?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "billing_transaction_info_type": 1,
  "cursor": "\"\"",
  "encrypted_payout_ids": [
    "10376329180766",
    "637926329180767"
  ],
  "page_size": 100
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.RPCRequest("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)

v2.payment.get_escrow_detail_batch.description: This API is applicable for Cross Border (CB) sellers only to get the detailed payout transaction data, both released and to-be released transaction can be found in here

request_parameters.name: order_sn_list
request_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. limit [1,50] The number of recommended requests ranges from 1 to 20 orders.

response_parameters.name: escrow_detail
response_parameters.description: The escrow detail for one order

response_parameters.name: order_sn
response_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. <path></path>

response_parameters.name: buyer_user_name
response_parameters.description: The username of buyer. <path></path>

response_parameters.name: return_order_sn_list
response_parameters.description: The list of the serial number of return. <path></path>

response_parameters.name: escrow_amount
response_parameters.description: The total amount that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order is completed. For non cb sip affiliate shop (new formula): escrow_amount= original_cost_of_goods_sold-original_shopee_discount+seller_return_refund+ shopee_discounts- voucher_from_seller- seller_coin_cash_back+ buyer_paid_shipping_fee- actual_shipping_fee+ shopee_shipping_rebate+ shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl- reverse_shipping_fee+ rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount+ fsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount- final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee- seller_transaction_fee- service_fee- commission_fee- campaign_fee- shipping_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount- delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount-final_escrow_product_gst- order_ams_commission fee- escrow_tax-sales_tax_on_lvg-reverse_shipping_fee_sst-shipping_fee_sst-withholding_tax-overseas_return_service_fee-vat_on_imported_goods For cb sip affiliate shop: escrow_amount=escrow_amount_pri * exchange_rate note: Return refund amount = if adjustable RR, will equal to drc_adjustable_refund

response_parameters.name: order_original_price
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

response_parameters.name: original_price
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

response_parameters.name: order_selling_price
response_parameters.description: This field value = sum of item unit price.selling price comes from the sum up of each item's unit price. For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like order_original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo.It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: order_seller_discount
response_parameters.description: The total discount seller provided for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_discount
response_parameters.description: Final sum of each item seller discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: order_discounted_price
response_parameters.description: The total discounted price for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: shopee_discount
response_parameters.description: Final sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. This amount will rebate to seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate order. )

response_parameters.name: voucher_from_seller
response_parameters.description: Final value of voucher provided by Seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: voucher_from_shopee
response_parameters.description: Final value of voucher provided by Shopee for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: coins
response_parameters.description: This value indicates the total amount offset when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: cross_border_tax
response_parameters.description: Amount incurred by Buyer for purchasing items outside of home country. Amount may change after Return Refund. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: payment_promotion
response_parameters.description: The amount offset via payment promotion. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: commission_fee
response_parameters.description: The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable. For CB SIP affiliate shop: commission_fee=commission_fee_pri * exchange_rate

response_parameters.name: service_fee
response_parameters.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services. For CB SIP affiliate shop: service_fee=service_fee_pri * exchange_rate

response_parameters.name: seller_transaction_fee
response_parameters.description: Tansaction fee paid by seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_lost_compensation
response_parameters.description: Compensation to seller in case of lost parcel. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_coin_cash_back
response_parameters.description: Value of coins provided by Seller for purchasing with his or her store for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: escrow_tax
response_parameters.description: Cross-border tax imposed by the Indonesian government on sellers. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: final_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: Final adjusted amount that seller has to bear as part of escrow. This amount could be negative or positive. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: actual_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The final shipping cost of order and it is positive. For Non-integrated logistics channel is 0. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: shopee_shipping_rebate
response_parameters.description: The platform shipping subsidy to the seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee_sst
response_parameters.description: The Service Tax charged on Seller Paid Shipping Fee for forward shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. Definition of Seller Paid Shipping Fee is Actual Shipping Fee subtracted by sum of Shipping Fee Paid by Buyer and Shipping Rebate From Shopee. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee_discount_from_pl
response_parameters.description: The discount of shipping fee from 3PL. Currently only applicable to ID. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_shipping_discount
response_parameters.description: The shipping discount defined by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: estimated_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: seller_voucher_code
response_parameters.description: The list of voucher code provided by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: drc_adjustable_refund
response_parameters.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center.

response_parameters.name: refund_amount_to_buyer
response_parameters.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return.

response_parameters.name: cost_of_goods_sold
response_parameters.description: Final amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: original_cost_of_goods_sold
response_parameters.description: Amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: original_shopee_discount
response_parameters.description: Sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: items
response_parameters.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for all the items in this order, including regular items(non-activity) and activity items.

response_parameters.name: item_id
response_parameters.description: ID of item

response_parameters.name: item_name
response_parameters.description: Name of item

response_parameters.name: item_sku
response_parameters.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: model_id
response_parameters.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

response_parameters.name: model_name
response_parameters.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer variations of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate variation. Each variation can have a different quantity and price.

response_parameters.name: model_sku
response_parameters.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are variations of one item in Shopee Listings.

response_parameters.name: original_price
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

response_parameters.name: original_price_pri
response_parameters.description: The agreed settlement price of items used as settlement basis, amount is in the primary currency. (Only display for CB SIP affiliate shop.)

response_parameters.name: selling_price
response_parameters.description: For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like item original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1 (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop.)

response_parameters.name: discounted_price
response_parameters.description: The after-discount price of the item in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. If there is no discount, this value will be the same as that of original_price.

response_parameters.name: seller_discount
response_parameters.description: The discount provided by seller for this item

response_parameters.name: shopee_discount
response_parameters.description: The discount provided by Shopee for this item

response_parameters.name: discount_from_coin
response_parameters.description: The offset of this item when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. In case of bundle deal item, this value will return 0. Due to technical restriction, this field will return incorrect value under bundle deal case if we don’t configure it to 0.

response_parameters.name: discount_from_voucher_shopee
response_parameters.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use Shopee voucher.

response_parameters.name: discount_from_voucher_seller
response_parameters.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use seller-specific voucher.

response_parameters.name: activity_type
response_parameters.description: The type of the item, default is "". If the item is a bundle item the value is "bundle_deal", and if a add on deal item, the value is "add_on_deal"

response_parameters.name: activity_id
response_parameters.description: If bundle_deal the is id of bundle deal, if add_on_deal this is id of add on deal.

response_parameters.name: is_main_item
response_parameters.description: Meaning a main or sub item for add_on_deal.

response_parameters.name: quantity_purchased
response_parameters.description: This value indicates the number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

response_parameters.name: is_b2c_shop_item
response_parameters.description: Indicates whether this is a B2C owned item.

response_parameters.name: ams_commission_fee
response_parameters.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee. Applicable for items sold via the Affiliate Program.

response_parameters.name: escrow_amount_pri
response_parameters.description: The total amount in the prim currency that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order completed . escrow_amount_pri=original_price_pri-seller_return_refund_pri-commission_fee_pri-service_fee_pri-drc_adjustable_refund_pri.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

response_parameters.name: buyer_total_amount_pri
response_parameters.description: The total amount that paid by buyer in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

response_parameters.name: original_price_pri
response_parameters.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the primary currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. ) <path></path>

response_parameters.name: seller_return_refund_pri
response_parameters.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: commission_fee_pri
response_parameters.description: The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: service_fee_pri
response_parameters.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: drc_adjustable_refund_pri
response_parameters.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center in the primary currency after proration. (Only applicable for cb sip affiliate shop.)

response_parameters.name: pri_currency
response_parameters.description: The currency of the country or region where the shop that real seller operates. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: aff_currency
response_parameters.description: The currency of the country or region where shop opened in. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: exchange_rate
response_parameters.description: Exchange rate from primary shop currency to affiliate shop currency.

response_parameters.name: reverse_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: Shopee charges the reverse shipping fee for the returned order.The value of this field will be non-negative.

response_parameters.name: reverse_shipping_fee_sst
response_parameters.description: The Service Tax charged on Reverse Shipping Fee for reverse shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

response_parameters.name: final_product_protection
response_parameters.description: The total amount of product protection purchased during placing an order.

response_parameters.name: credit_card_promotion
response_parameters.description: This value indicate the offset via credit card promotion.

response_parameters.name: credit_card_transaction_fee
response_parameters.description: This value indicate the total transaction fee. credit_card_transaction_fee=buyer_transaction_fee+seller_transaction_fee

response_parameters.name: final_product_vat_tax
response_parameters.description: Value-added Tax is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations . (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: final_shipping_vat_tax
response_parameters.description: Value-added Tax for product price is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

response_parameters.name: campaign_fee
response_parameters.description: The campaign fee charged by Shopee platform. Only available for some local Indonesian shops.

response_parameters.name: sip_subsidy
response_parameters.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

response_parameters.name: sip_subsidy_pri
response_parameters.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. This value is in the primary currency. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

response_parameters.name: rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount
response_parameters.description: The insurance claim amount if seller opt in to insurance program. this covers Reverse shipping Fee in the case of RR. As per Jun 2024: - For ID & MY Local: After Extension on coverage to FSF due to RR. this claim amount will consist of FSF + RSF claim. - For PH local: This will only cover RSF claim will be updated if there's any RR/cancellation

response_parameters.name: rsf_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount
response_parameters.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services. Only apply for PH local orders.

response_parameters.name: final_escrow_product_gst
response_parameters.description: Goods and Service Tax for product price is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore)

response_parameters.name: final_escrow_shipping_gst
response_parameters.description: Goods and Service Tax for shipping fee is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore.)

response_parameters.name: delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount
response_parameters.description: [Currently apply to ID & local orders only] An insurance premium charged to seller at the time parcel is picked up by 3PL for insurance in case of parcel lost/damaged by 3PL.

response_parameters.name: order_ams_commission_fee
response_parameters.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee for this order. Applicable for orders sold via the Affiliate Program.

response_parameters.name: buyer_payment_method
response_parameters.description: The payment method buyer used when do the order checkout.

response_parameters.name: instalment_plan
response_parameters.description: The instalment plan buyer chosen when do the order checkout. Only applicable when payment method support instalment.

response_parameters.name: sales_tax_on_lvg
response_parameters.description: Sales Tax on Low Value Goods (LVG) is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Malaysia SST regulations for selective orders (e.g. CB LVG orders in MY)

response_parameters.name: withholding_tax
response_parameters.description: Only for PH local shops. According to regulations issued by Bureau of Internal Revenue in PH, the Withholding Tax is applied to the gross remittances sent by Shopee to online suppliers of goods and services.

response_parameters.name: overseas_return_service_fee
response_parameters.description: This is overseas return service fee charged to sellers who register ORS program.(Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

response_parameters.name: prorated_coins_value_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated value from cash equivalent of coin offset due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_shopee_voucher_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated refund value from shopee voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_seller_voucher_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated refund value from seller voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_payment_channel_promo_bank_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated value from bank payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: prorated_payment_channel_promo_shopee_offset_return_items
response_parameters.description: This is the prorated value from shopee payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

response_parameters.name: fsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount
response_parameters.description: The claim amount given to seller if seller opt in to shipping fee service program. this covers Forward Shipping Fee cost in the case of cancelled due to Failed delivery. only apply to PH Local as per Jun 2024.

response_parameters.name: shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount
response_parameters.description: Service fee charged to seller in MY,ID,PH Local (as per Jun 2024) due to additional program purchased

response_parameters.name: final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The amount of fee charged to seller (if any) for the failed delivery order

response_parameters.name: vat_on_imported_goods
response_parameters.description: 7% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Thailand

response_parameters.name: buyer_payment_info
response_parameters.description: The buyer payment info at order checkout moment. (snapshot value)

response_parameters.name: buyer_payment_method
response_parameters.description: The payment method used by buyer.

response_parameters.name: buyer_service_fee
response_parameters.description: An additional service fee charged by shopee to Buyer at checkout. currently only applicable to ID region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: buyer_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The tax amount paid by buyer. currently this is a custom tax charged to CB orders in TW,CL,MX

response_parameters.name: buyer_total_amount
response_parameters.description: The total amount paid by buyer at checkout moment.

response_parameters.name: credit_card_promotion
response_parameters.description: The promotion provided by credit card. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: icms_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The icms tax paid by buyer. this is only applicable to BR region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: import_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The import tax paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: initial_buyer_txn_fee
response_parameters.description: Transaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. ). Most regions would have this fee charged to buyer at checkout depending on the fee rules applied in each region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: insurance_premium
response_parameters.description: The insurance premium paid by buyer. Currently only applicable to some regions like ID & BR it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: iof_tax_amount
response_parameters.description: The iof tax paid by buyer. this is only applicable for BR region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: is_paid_by_credit_card
response_parameters.description: Whether this order is paid by credit card. it's related to payment channel used at checkout

response_parameters.name: merchant_subtotal
response_parameters.description: The total item price paid by buyer at checkout. it is an initial value and will not be updated after RR/cancellation

response_parameters.name: seller_voucher
response_parameters.description: The voucher provided by seller to offset some value needs to be paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee
response_parameters.description: The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shipping_fee_sst_amount
response_parameters.description: The shipping fee sst paid by buyer. Currently apply to MY region only it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shopee_voucher
response_parameters.description: The voucher provided by Shopee to offset the amount need to be paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: shopee_coins_redeemed
response_parameters.description: This is an amount of coin used by buyer at checkout to offset some amount to be paid. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Error code

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Error message

v2.payment.generate_income_statement.description: Use this API to fetch the details of order income by batch.

request_parameters.name: release_time_from
request_parameters.description: The release_time_from must be - Monday (GTM+8) for a weekly report - The 1st day (GTM+8) of a Month for a monthly report

request_parameters.name: release_time_to
request_parameters.description: The release_time_to must be - Sunday (GTM+8) for a weekly report - The last day (GTM+8) of a Month for a monthly report

request_parameters.name: statement_type
request_parameters.description: STATEMENT_TYPE_WEEKLY = 1; STATEMENT_TYPE_MONTHLY = 2; Local seller Income statement requires this value to be set. CB seller income statement does not require this.

response_parameters.name: id
response_parameters.description: Identifier of income statement file.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: error code

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: error message

error_codes.error_description: Shop is not a mart shop. Please use Mart Shop ID.
Invalid time range, Weekly reports must span from Day 1 (Monday) to Day 7 (Sunday), and monthly reports must cover from 1st to last day of the month.
Wrong income statement type. Please provide the correct parameter.
Wrong income statement type. Please provide the correct parameter.
Wrong income statement type. Please provide the correct parameter.
For local sellers, please input weekly or monthly.

request_example.php:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/payment/generate_income_statement?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&release_time_from=1234567890&release_time_to=1234567890&shop_id=123456&sign=sign&statement_type=1&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

request_parameters.name: income_statement_id
request_parameters.description: The identifier for income statement file request. return from the API v2.payment.generate_income_statement

response_parameters.name: id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for income statement file request.

response_parameters.name: file_name
response_parameters.description: Income statement file name.

response_parameters.name: status
response_parameters.description: STATUS_INVALID = 0; STATUS_PROCESSING = 1; STATUS_DOWNLOADABLE = 2; STATUS_DOWNLOADED = 3; STATUS_FAILED = 4;

response_parameters.name: generated_time
response_parameters.description: File generation time.

response_parameters.name: file_link
response_parameters.description: Link to download income statement file.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Error Code

  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "additional_tiers": [

    "end_time": 1610000000,

request_example.python:
import requests
import json

url = "https://open.admin.shopee.io/api/v2/bundle_deal/add_bundle_deal?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "additional_tiers": [
    {
      "discount_percentage": 20,
      "discount_value": 20,
      "fix_price": 100,
      "min_amount": 100
    }
  ],
  "discount_percentage": 33,
  "discount_value": 11,
  "end_time": 1610000000,
  "fix_price": 11,
  "min_amount": 1,
  "name": "bundle name",
  "purchase_limit": 3,
  "rule_type": 1,
  "start_time": 1600000000
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.request("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)

request_parameters.name: voucher_name
request_parameters.description: The name of the voucher.

request_parameters.name: voucher_code
request_parameters.description: The code of the voucher.

request_parameters.name: start_time
request_parameters.description: The timing from when the voucher is valid; so buyer is allowed to claim and to use. Field can only be updated if voucher has not started.

request_parameters.name: end_time
request_parameters.description: The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use.

request_parameters.name: voucher_type
request_parameters.description: The type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: shop voucher, 2: product voucher.

request_parameters.name: reward_type
request_parameters.description: The reward type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: fix_amount voucher, 2: discount_percentage voucher, 3: coin_cashback voucher.

request_parameters.name: usage_quantity
request_parameters.description: The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.

request_parameters.name: min_basket_price
request_parameters.description: The minimum spend required for using this voucher.

request_parameters.name: discount_amount
request_parameters.description: The discount amount set for this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a fix amount voucher.

request_parameters.name: percentage
request_parameters.description: The discount percentage set for this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher.

request_parameters.name: max_price
request_parameters.description: The max amount of discount/value a user can enjoy by using this particular voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher.If no cap limit, can set to be 0.

request_parameters.name: display_channel_list
request_parameters.description: The FE channel where the voucher will be displayed. The available values are: 1: display_all 3: feed, 4: live streaming, [] (empty - which is hidden).

request_parameters.name: item_id_list
request_parameters.description: The list of items which is applicable for the voucher. Only fill in when you are creating a product type of voucher.

request_parameters.name: display_start_time
request_parameters.description: The timing of when voucher is displayed on shop pages; so buyer is allowed to claim.display_start_time must be left empty if the display_channel_list is empty (when voucher is hidden), otherwise it will show error.

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

response_parameters.name: response
response_parameters.description: Detailed informations you are querying.

response_parameters.name: voucher_id
response_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the created voucher.

response_parameters.name: reward_type

response_parameters.description: The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.

response_parameters.name: end_time
response_parameters.description: The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use.

response_parameters.name: discount_amount

response_parameters.name: item_id_list
response_parameters.description: The list of items which is applicable for the voucher. Only return a value when it is a product type of voucher.

response_parameters.name: target_voucher

response_parameters.name: whs_id
response_parameters.description: To indicate the warehouse id where item will be returned to. Please call v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail to check the detailed warehouse information the item returned to with the field "location_id" of the v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail match to the field"whs_id"of the v2.return.get_return_detail. For fulfillment by Shopee (FBS) & multi warehouse sellers, R/R orders will be returned back to the nearest warehouse of buyer address instead of going back to only 1 default return address like a normal seller.If it's a normal seller, then the field will be response empty.

response_parameters.name: return_refund_type
response_parameters.description: To indicate whether the return is RRBOC (Return/Refund request raised before Order Complete) or RRAOC (Return/Refund request raised after Order Complete).

response_parameters.name: return_solution
response_parameters.description: To indicate the most updated solution of the Return/Refund request (NOTE: this is not the solution during negotiation). Applicable value: - 0: Return and Refund - 1: Refund Only

v2.returns.get_return_list.description: Use this api to get detail information of a return by return id.

request_parameters.name: page_no
request_parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is 0. if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

request_parameters.name: page_size
request_parameters.description: if many items are available to retrieve, you may need to call GetReturnList multiple times to retrieve all the data. Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Default is 40. Use the Pagination filters to control the maximum number of entries (<= 100) to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), the offset number to start next call. This integer value is usUed to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single ""page"" of data.

request_parameters.name: create_time_from
request_parameters.description: The create_time_from and create_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the order create time). The create_time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the create_time_from and create_time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: create_time_to
request_parameters.description: The create_time_from and create_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the order create time). The create_time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the create_time_from and create_time_to fields is 15 days.

request_parameters.name: update_time_from
request_parameters.description: The update_time_from and update_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the last return updated time). The update_time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the update_time_from and update_time_to fields is 15 days. update_time_from should be >= create_time_from

request_parameters.name: update_time_to
request_parameters.description: The update_time_from and update_time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the last return updated time). The update_time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the update_time_from and update_time_to fields is 15 days. update_time_from should be >= create_time_from

response_parameters.description: Punishment Type of this punishment record. Applicable values: 103: Listings not displayed in category browsing 104: Listings not displayed in search 105: Unable to create new listings 106: Unable to edit listings 107: Unable to join marketing campaigns 108: No shipping subsidies 109: Account is suspended 600: Listings not displayed in search 601: Shop listings hide from recommendation 602: Listings not displayed in category browsing 1109: Listing Limit is reduced 1110: Listing Limit is reduced 1111: Listing Limit is reduced 1112: Listing Limit is reduced 2008: Order Limit

response_parameters.description: Reference ID for this punishment record.

response_parameters.name: listing_limit
response_parameters.description: Return the specific value of listing limit when punishment_type is: 1109: Listing Limit is reduced 1110: Listing Limit is reduced 1111: Listing Limit is reduced 1112: Listing Limit is reduced

response_parameters.name: order_limit
response_parameters.description: Return the specific percentage of order limit when punishment_type is: 2008: Order Limit Daily Order Limit = X % * L28D ADO (Average Daily Order of this Shop in Past 28 Days)

response_parameters.name: total_count
response_parameters.description: Total number of punishment records.

request_example.python:
import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/create_auto_product_ads?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "budget": 10.5,
  "end_date": "-",
  "reference_id": "asdf-1234-qwerty",
  "start_date": "11-11-2023"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.RPCRequest("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)
